position: Officer, Talent Acquisition (at One More Restaurant)
Job Description:
1. Execute recruitment and consolidate staff requisitions from all functions and incorporated into recruitment plan to ensure the vacancies are timely fulfilled.
2. Build applicant sources (talent pool) and perform sourcing through offline or online channels to fill open positions and anticipate future needs
3. Prepare job announcements through various recruitment platforms both virtual and off-line channels to acquire potential candidates. 
4. Shortlist candidates following job requirements and implement recruitment process to ensure potential talents are selected
5. Acquire and maintain all necessary documents from employees (CV, academic and employment records, national ID, family book, guarantee letter, medical health checkup, employee book etc…)
6. Record and update employee’s information in HRIS system to ensure that employee data are up-to-date and ready to use
7. Implement onboarding program to ensure that inductions are effectively conducted

9. Other talks assigned by superiors

o Have strong talent networks

o Good communication and report presentation
o Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software)

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

job title: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Siem Reap)
position: Provincial Sales Manager (to be based in Siem Reap)
Job Description:
• Lead and develop members of your team utilizing the tools and processes developed by HR
• Ensure that the leadership and development of the people in your team is given sufficient time and focus 
• Proactively act as a coach and mentor to your team to enable them to improve their skills and knowledge 
• Identify and resolve employee/team problems and conflict 
• Support in the recruitment of suitable people for your team and the company as a whole 
• Act as a ‘subject matter expert’ in your area of expertise, sharing that knowledge on Sales Operations to your team & colleagues
• Ensure you continue to develop your knowledge and expertise through your own ‘personal career development’ and utilizing training and development offered by company
• Act as an advocate of the company, promoting it internally and externally. This includes creating and managing any social media to share, like and comment on the company’s published content.
• Direct, motivate, & support professional sales team to accomplish their objectives 
• Manage sales activities and daily sales deal status in Odoo-CRM, expenses reporting, and cross-functional reporting (Such as Stock, Service, BPO, etc.) with own area of responsibility. Grow network with own area of responsibility
• Accountable for ensuring all RMA’s policies and procedure are follow within the showrooms and/or responsible area.
• Advise sales team through the sales process, including but not limited to prospecting -> closing area
• Coach and mentor sales team on the following topics; including but not limited to needs, features & benefits, closing deals, time and territory management, negotiating, product knowledge, and productivity improvement
• Create and monitor annual sales department benchmarks and budget, in alignment with the organization’s financial and operational objectives
• Ensure customer satisfaction. Work with the sales team to know the customer’s current and future expectations (Customer Talk) and work with all departments to resolve customer concern/issue.
• Lead the sales team to effectively understand and use manufacturer’s products and programs to attain acceptable market share levels.
• Foster an engaged work environment within the locations, encouraging accountability, open communication, teamwork, and a commitment to serving the customer.
• Ensure that the company/location reputation and image in the community is consistent with RMA/AED Integrated Core Values, and that business relationships with all stakeholders are not compromised
• Responsible for ensuring that sound and safe business practices and processes are implemented and continuously improved to effectively and efficiently achieve ethical business objectives
• Perform all other duties as assigned by management in a professional and efficient manner.
• Full responsible for P & L of own department/area of responsibility
• Manage costs at reasonable levels and in line with Budget
• Actively advise any concerns related to profitability of Sales Department
• Report to TSM/DGM 
• Meet with Aftersales, Marketing, and other Sales Dept., regularly to evaluate inter-departmental concerns on skills and performance required for each individual for improvement 
• Closely liaise with RMA Group on policy matters
• Develop and maintain good relationships with customers, business partners, networking people, government and private sectors
• This position is based in province (s), and  required to travel (>60%) to visit and support sales team in own province (s) of responsibility, require regular routine calendar and respond to urgent needs as per business operations’ requirement 
• Hold valid Driving License

• Record in successfully running Sales Dept. or related field

• Listening, Understanding and Responding
• Mentoring, Coaching & Performance Management 
• Knowledge of business Environment

• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills

• Excellent organization skills – able to prioritize

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005.

Company Profile:
As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

As Cambodia’s longest-serving and only 100% locally owned mobile communications company, Cellcard has more than 24 years of service to the Kingdom maintaining a customer base of more than 4 million subscribers.

Cellcard launched in 1997 in a joint venture with Millicom International Cellular providing its customers with the first prepaid service with scratchcards.

What followed for Cellcard was a number of firsts in the market such as introducing SMS, Value-Added Services, a dedicated Loyalty program, roaming services and a credit sharing platform.

Cellcard is Cambodia’s most-awarded mobile network having achieved more than 30 industry awards for network excellence including an impressive six consecutive Ookla Speedtest awards and a number of category wins from Opensignal including Best Games Experience in February 2020.

It’s most recent market firsts include the Cellcard Network Guarantee launched in 2017 reimbursing any customer who experiences a dropped call, the award-winning App-based Super Data Race held each year since 2017 and its move to lead the esports agenda in 2018 followed in 2019 with Cambodia’s first virtual gamer platform PlayGame and the first tailormade gamer data plan PlayGame Unlimited.

In February 2021, Cellcard revealed its latest innovation, the Pouk Mak chat app, the world’s first major Khmer languaged messaging App.

A major focus for Cellcard now is its evolution to 5G for consumers and enterprise, including Smart City applications across Fintech and web security, data privacy, public safety and security, environment protection, education, healthcare and e-government.

In terms of 5G network readiness, Cellcard has conducted numerous live tests on its stand-alone site reaching speeds of 1.8 gigabytes per second. These are Cambodia’s first and only tests conducted on a real end-to-end with 5G radio to a 5G core network able to accommodate network slicing for dedicated use cases.

Company Profile: Baker Tilly Cambodia ranks among the largest accountancy firms in Cambodia, and is an independent member firm of Baker Tilly International which is currently ranks among Top 10 largest accountancy networks in the world with approximately 41,234 staffs in 145 countries/territories.We provide a full range of professional services which include audit & assurance, taxation, forensics & investigation, corporate recovery & restructuring and insolvency management.Baker Tilly Cambodia is:- A member firm of Kampuchea Institute of Certified Public Accountants and Auditors (KICPAA)- A licensed audit firm approved by Accounting and Auditing Regulator of Cambodia (ACAR)- An accredited audit firm licensed by Securities & Exchange Regulator of Cambodia (SERC)- A licensed tax agent approved by Cambodian General Department of Taxation (GDT)- An accredited audit firm licensed by National Bank of Cambodia (NBC) for Banking and Financial InstitutionsBaker Tilly Cambodia is recognized as Approved Employer in Cambodia by ACCA, who holds Trainee Development approval at Platinum level as well as Professional Development approval. Job Description:
- The successful candidates will be responsible for overseeing audit teams servicing local and multinational
clients and monitoring the completion of audit assignments, including reporting to our clients’ board of
management.
- Your job scope will include planning and organizing audit assignments, conducting reviews on the
systems of accounting and internal controls, finalization of statutory and group financial statements and
reviewing audit reports, management letters, consolidated accounts, tax and deferred tax computations
and overseas reporting packages.
- You will lead teams of senior and assistant auditors and execute efficient client audits with high quality
deliverables.
- Your clients will range from a variety of different specializations throughout the country and region. You
will work closely with Managers, Directors and Partners.
Job Requirement:
- A university degree in accounting or related field, and holds professional qualifications such as ACCA, CA
or CPA would be advantageous
- At least 6 years audit experience working in an international professional services firm or large corporate
environment
- Good computer literacy
- Strong technical ability, excellent interpersonal skills and formidable leadership qualities
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
- An excellent command of written and spoken English;
- A willingness to travel as business demands;

Job Description:
We are seeking to recruit for proficient in restaurant field, Floor Supervisor. You will be a floor supervisor to manage the whole restaurant, 

Job Descriptions
You are responsible for training new staff and disciplining of restaurant staff. Managing the whole restaurant; customer service, employees requires training and dealing with restaurant policies to the worker, scheduling shifts. Customer service duties for a restaurant floor supervisor include taking complaint and greeting customer. Floor Supervisor are physically present on the restaurant floor to monitor the quality of the service and in order to ensure the restaurant complies with the local health and safety codes for eating establishments. Facilitate to perform the administrative duties, such as ordering inventory and supplies, tallying receipts, preparing deposits, and processing employee management. And floor supervisor will be performed any related duties and assignment as required.

- Excellent organization and strong ability of customer service skill
- Ability to demonstrate good supervisory skills and to work effectively as part of a team
- Ability to grasp new concepts quickly, generate fresh and innovative ideas.
- Good organizational skills, ability to prioritize and work effectively within an often busy environment, whilst maintaining compliance to company policies and procedures

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: School Counselor _ អ្នកប្រឹក្សាសិក្សាសាលា
Job Description:
• ជួបពិភាក្សា និងណែនាំសិស្សដែលមានបញ្ហាការសិក្សាខ្សោយ បញ្ហាចិត្តសាស្រ្ត បញ្ហាអាកប្បកិរិយា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យផ្សេងៗ។
• ជួបពិភាក្សាជាមួយមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សអំពីបញ្ហាការសិក្សា និងបញ្ហាវិន័យរបស់សិស្ស។
• សម្របសម្រួលរវាងសិស្ស និងគ្រូ រវាងមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល និងសាលា នៅពេលពួកគាត់មានការត្អូញត្អែរ ឬមានការតវ៉ាផ្សេងៗ។
• ធ្វើផែនការ និងយុទ្ធនាការផ្សេងៗដើម្បីតម្រង់ទិស និងពង្រឹងវិន័យដល់សិស្សានុសិស្ស (អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ)។ 
• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបន្ទុកថា្នក់ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ព័ន្ទក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាសិស្ស។
• មើលសិស្សពេលចូលមកសាលា ចេញលេង និងចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
• ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យតាមថ្នាក់ម្តងម្កាលពេលម៉ោងសិក្សា ដើម្បីមើលបញ្ហាសិស្ស និងគ្រូ។
• ចូលរួមប្រជុំនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។
• ណាត់ជួបមាតាបិតា ឬអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ទៅចាងហ្វាងដោយផ្ទាល់មាត់ជារៀងរាល់សប្តាហ៍។
Job Requirement: • បញ្ចប់សញ្ញាបត្របរិញ្ញាបត្រចិត្តវិទ្យា ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។  • មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ឬបទពិសោធន៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធ យ៉ាងតិចពីរឆ្នាំ។• មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងដំណាក់កាលលូតលាស់របស់កុមារ និងជំទង់។ • មានចំណេះដឹង និងមានក្រមសីលធម៌ជាអ្នកប្រឹក្សាយោបល់។• ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជា Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Power Point, Internet និង Email។• មានលក្ខណៈសម្បត្តិជាអ្នកដឹកនាំ។• ចេះគោរពពេលវេលា ស្មោះត្រង់ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ចេះបត់បែន និងអាចទទួលយកចំណេះដឹងថ្មីៗ។• មានជំនាញសម្របសម្រួល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហានានា។• អាចនិយាយ និងសរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ និងអាចប្រើប្រាស់ភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន។• មានសមត្ថភាពវិភាគស្ថានភាពរបស់សិស្ស ដោយធ្វើផែនការ អនុវត្ត តាមដាន និងវាយតម្លៃ។• មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ។• មានការចូលរួមសកម្មភាពជួយសង្គម និងវគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្តាលខ្លីៗ។មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងការផ្ដួចផ្ដើម។How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: 012 797 939Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564*Note: CV without photo will not be selected for shortlisting.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
-	Maintain and develop an Academic Quality Framework which includes policies, processes and procedures.
-	Maintain and develop an appropriate assessment framework, which ensures the production of high-quality assessment instruments, which are appropriately marked and lead to fair and consistent awards.
-	Oversee the recruitment and management of external academic consultants who develop, maintain and approve syllabuses and assessments and moderate the marking of assessments. 
-	Propose and manage the Academic Directorate budget ensuring that all essential activities are supported and that services are cost effective.
-	Develop and maintain a suite of academic products that are competitive in the market to ensure appropriate outcomes for students, including appropriate use of digital tools for both delivery and support.
-	Responsibility and accountability for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with the other department strategic plans and direction.
-	Create a dynamic and forward-looking research environment for both staff and students
-	Ensure that staff performance is managed appropriately and in a way that is consistent with the expectations of the School, and that fair workload allocation processes are in place.
-	Ensure all staff have access to the necessary support to enable them to contribute fully and develop their skills and experience.
-	Engender a culture of excellence, co-operation and respect both within and beyond the department.
-	Make effective use of all staffing resources and seek opportunities for collaboration and joint working with others beyond the department and beyond the academic members.
-	Ensure a safe and healthy environment for both staff and students, and full compliance with health and safety requirements.
-	Ensure all activities are carried out to the highest possible standards and put in place the necessary evaluation and monitoring procedures to ensure both compliance and improvement: such procedures will include teaching, research and management of all resources.
-	Comply with auditing, quality assurance and risk management procedures both internal and external.
Job Requirement:
*	Qualifications and Experiences

-	Bachelor’s degree in education / education Leadership, Master’s preferred.
-	At least 4 years in academic management position
-	Have a very strong academic record and standing 
-	Normally be at professorial level - although skills and aptitude will be more important 
-	Have a very good understanding of the academic disciplines within the department
-	Ability to engage constructively with people 
-	Excellent communication skills 
-	Very good ambassadorial and diplomatic skill 
-	Ability to manage a number of competing demands 
-	Excellent delegation skills 
-	Be flexible and adapt to changing circumstances 
-	Be able to develop their skills and seek advice from a variety of sources 
-	be willing and able to exercise judgement and take risks

* Knowledge, Skills, Abilities and Other Requirements:

-	High levels of personal integrity.
-	Conscientious and able to focus on completing work to a consistently high standard.
-	Flexible and positive approach to work.
-	Excellent organizational and time-management skills; high attention to detail.
-	Ability to work to tight deadlines and able to prompt others to ensure deadlines are achieved.
-	Adaptable to working in a fast paced ever changing environment.
-	Ability to work under pressure and remain calm.
-	Self-motivated and enthusiastic.
-	Continually strive for improvement.
Company Profile: Greenfield International School is a place where diversity is celebrated and unity is nurtured. We take bold steps in embracing both scientific and artistic values of education, as articulated in our well-balanced syllabuses. Through PreK-12 levels, students participates actively in the learning process, developing strong conceptual grounds and asking probing questions to drive innovative thinking. Healthy competitions and collaboration are interwoven realities of student life.

Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703 recruitment@sokimex.com.kh Phnom Penh Villa No. 22, Street Kramounsar, Sangkat Phsar Thmey II, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703

Implement engineering and operational strategies to provide leading edge service delivery levels.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Job Description:
-	Identify, develop, or evaluate marketing strategy, based on knowledge of establishment objectives, market characteristics, and cost and markup factors.

-	Promoting the organization and products & service.
-	Understand our ideal customers and how they relate to our products.

-	4 years experiences in Sales and Marketing Management position. 
-	Experience in planning and implementing sales strategies.
-	Experience in customer relationship management.
-	Experience managing and directing a sales team.
-	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
-	Dedication to providing great customer service.
-	Ability to lead a sales and marketing team.
* Knowledge, Skills, Abilities and Other Requirements:
-	High levels of personal integrity.
-	Conscientious and able to focus on completing work to a consistently high standard.
-	Flexible and positive approach to work.
-	Excellent organizational and time-management skills; high attention to detail.
-	Ability to work to tight deadlines and able to prompt others to ensure deadlines are achieved.
-	Adaptable to working in a fast paced ever changing environment.
-	Ability to work under pressure and remain calm.
-	Self-motivated and enthusiastic.
-	Continually strive for improvement.

Company Profile:
Sinh Hak Hout is one of the leading home improvement centers in Cambodia. Starting from just a 50-square-meter retail space in 1999, we have expanded our current operations into a 6400-square-meter show space. Job Description:

Job Description:
o	Open and close the store

Job Description:
Inventory Controller
o Manages and controls on inventory turnover and costing.
o Analyzes and identifies best-selling items and slow-moving items.
o Works with marketing team to get rid of excess stock.
o Provides a range of administrative, accounting and inventory management support to Supply Chain Team and Operation Team.
o Supports warehouse team in receiving functions, including inbound container management.
o Schedules and manages all showrooms and central warehouse physical and cycle stock count.
o Identifies and solves any issues regarding stock locations, receiving, put away, picking, and
dispatch.
o Identifies and solves any stock discrepancies.
o Identifies and controls on inventory breakage.
o Manages all returned stock and identifies which is saleable and which is not
o Update inventory KPI report assigned by management.
o Manages and controls all showroom and central warehouse inventories.
o Oversees team of Showroom Inventory.
o Analyzes daily product and supply levels to anticipate inventory problems and shortages.
o Evaluates deliveries, shipments and product levels to improve inventory control procedures by
monitors the following reports.
- Stock Receiving Report
- Stock Delivery Report
- Stock Transfer Report
- Stock Detailed Balance Report
o Monitors demand and analyzes s data to anticipate future supply needs.
o Work with supply chain planner to effectively achieving the inventory targeted filled rate

Fixed Assets
o Prepares fixed assets register/capitalization.
o Prepares monthly / quarterly / yearly fixed Assets reports/reconciliation.
o Manages fixed assets transfer, disposal, adjustment, depreciation expense, physical
count/verification.
o Performs other task assigned by Management.
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor degree in Accounting or Other relevant fields is advantage
o 2-year experiences as warehouse inventory controller
o Experience in leading and motivating a small team.
o Knowledge of inventory and supply chain management
o Be able to analyze problems and offer solutions
o Ability to input, retrieve and analyze data
o Good time management and planning, Organizing and analytical skills.
o Be able to work independently and perform tasks with limited supervision.
o Highly effective, dynamic, and result-oriented with strong sense of responsibility.

Company Profile: Sokimex started from a humble beginning when the country was just waking up from a bleak chapter in her history. In this state, the company has to have two vital characteristic in order to prevail. Confidence and courage. Today we have developed a third trait in the company’s philosophy and that is Vision. We have confidence in our people, our partners and the free market. We have full confidence in the development of the country as long as it will take. Our confidence is shown in our eagerness to invest in long term projects and infrastructures. We do not like to go into short term projects because it will distract us from our long term goals. We invest in our people through education and knowledge. At the same time we have confidence in the Cambodian people to shape a progressive society. Our customers are also our long term business partners for without their continued support we will not grow and prosper. Without courage we will not be where we are today. We are proud we possess the courage to invest in large projects where others may shy away because it’s too risky. It’s not because we love to take risk but we have confidence in the people and country. We manage our risk with detailed analysis. It takes courage to deal in areas outside our core business. But we take it as a learning experience. We will not hesitate to draw in the best of talents both local and foreign to achieve our goals. And we go about it professionally and with honesty. We do not plan our business based on a five year plan, our vision is far longer. We forecast our business by the decades in the future because without doing so we might not be prepared for change. Just like in the glorious Angkorian era, the Angkor Wat was not build in a few years but it took generations of leaders with great vision over centuries to create something that last for ages. We represent the new Cambodian spirit 15 years after inception.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703 recruitment@sokimex.com.kh Phnom Penh Villa No. 22, Street Kramounsar, Sangkat Phsar Thmey II, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 0975626263 / 0885817999 /0714000703

Job Description: • Conducting market research to find answers about customer requirements, habits and trends• Brainstorming and developing ideas for creative marketing campaigns• Assisting in outbound or inbound marketing activities by demonstrating expertise in various areas (content development and optimization, advertising, events planning etc.)• Conduct market research to find answers about customer requirements, habits and trends• Brainstorm and develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns• Liaise with external vendors to execute promotional events and campaigns• Collaborate with marketing and other professionals to coordinate brand awareness and marketing efforts• Plan and execute initiatives to reach the target audience through appropriate channels (social media, e-mail, TV etc.)• Assist in analyzing marketing data (campaign results, conversion rates, traffic etc.) to help shape future marketing strategies• Undertake individual tasks of a marketing plan as assigned• All tasks are assigned by Mr. President Mike and school committee.Other Tasks:- To develop ideas for creative marketing campaigns, plan and execute initiatives to reach the target audience and analyze the results for future development of school events, school contests and school profile
Job Requirement: • Excellent organizational skills as you will be expected to complete competition administration which requires a high level of accuracy and a keen eye for detail. • Smart appearance and professional attitude. • Strategies for effective classroom management of kids, young learners and adults• Ability to develop and adapt materials to suit the needs of learner and group needs • Commitment to professional development • Commitment to fostering a supportive and encouraging working environment.• High organizational skills with proactive planning approach. • Flexibility, adaptability and ability to cope with changing priorities. • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. • You will need to keep yourself motivated during very busy periods and maintain a high standard of performance and conduct amongst them. • As a member of the center management team you will need to liaise with and support your fellow managers during very busy and, at times, stressful periods.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564 Due to high volume of applicants, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for the interview.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: Teacher of Science for Primary; 1 Position
position: Teacher of Science for Primary; 1 Position
Job Description:

-	Preparing curriculum, lesson plans, and teaching materials for class instruction and activities, managing information 
-	Adapting teaching methods, learning strategies, and instructional materials to meet the varying needs and interests of students.

-	Establishing classroom expectations, observing and evaluating student performance, behavior, social development, and health.

-	Preparing and implementing remedial programmes for students requiring extra help.

-	Professional Teaching qualification/license/certification as applicable
-	Preference will be given to those holding a Master’s degree

-	Experience in Cambridge International Curriculum is desired, but not essential.

-រៀបចំ និងផលិតសម្ភារសម្រាប់បម្រើឱ្យការបង្រៀន

-	មានសញ្ញាបត្រគរុកោសល្យផ្នែកបង្រៀនថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនចាប់ពី២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
-	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ចេះអត់ធ្មត់ ចេះជួយគ្នា ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងចេះចែករំលែក 
-	មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ ចូលចិត្តបំពេញកិច្ចការជាក្រុម និងជាមួយសិស្ស
-	អាចបំពេញកិច្ចការក្រោមសម្ពាធ
-	យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ក្នុងការបំពេញកិច្ចការ ចេះបត់បែន និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្ពស់
-	ស្រលាញ់ចូលចិត្តការងារបង្រៀន និងគោរពពេលវេលាធ្វើការ
III.	Knowledge, Skills, Abilities and Other Requirements:
-	High levels of personal integrity.
-	Conscientious and able to focus on completing work to a consistently high standard.
-	Flexible and positive approach to work.
-	Excellent organizational and time-management skills; high attention to detail.
-	Ability to work to tight deadlines and able to prompt others to ensure deadlines are achieved.
-	Adaptable to working in a fast paced ever changing environment.
-	Ability to work under pressure and remain calm.
-	Self-motivated and enthusiastic.
-	Continually strive for improvement.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: សន្តិសុខ ;​  ៥នាក់
position: សន្តិសុខ ;​  ៥នាក់
Job Description:
-	មើលថែរក្សាសន្តិសុខបរិវេនសាលា ការពារសុវត្តិភាព សិស្ស បុគ្គលិកសាលារៀននិងទ្រព្យសម្បតិ្តសាលា។
-	សម្អាតបរិវេនទីធ្លាខាងមុខសាលារៀនអោយបានស្អាត

-	មើលថែរក្សារថយន្ត រៀបចំសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់កង់ម៉ូតូអោយមានរបៀបរៀបរយ 
-	ជួយលើកសិស្សឡើងឡាន និងដាក់សិស្សចុះពីឡាន និងទទួលសិស្សពីអាណាព្យាបាលដោយការគោរព 
-	ជូន និងជួយសំរួលចរាចរពេលសិស្សឆ្លងផ្លូវ សំរួលចរាចរឡានដឹកសិស្សចេញចូល ឬពេលមានឡានភ្ញៀវមក 
-	តាមឡានដឹកសិស្សក្នុងករណីចាំបាច់
-	ការពារការបន្លំយកសិស្ស អំពើចាប់ជំរិត និងអំពើភារវកម្មផ្សេងៗ
Job Requirement:
-	កម្រិតវប្បធម៌យ៉ាងទាប ថ្នាក់ទី០៩  ឬបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាកម្រិតបឋមភូមិកាន់តែប្រសើ
-	ចេះអាន សរសេរភាសាខ្មែរបានល្អ
-	មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសខ្លះកាន់តែប្រសើ
-	មានអត្តចរិកល្អ មិនជាប់ពាក់ព័ន្ធនិងបទល្មើសនានា
-	មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការបំពេញការងារ និងមានចិត្តស្មោះត្រង់

job title: អ្នកបើកបរ ; ១០​ នាក់
position: អ្នកបើកបរ ; ១០​ នាក់
Job Description:
-ដឹកជញ្ជូនសិស្សពីផ្ទះមកសាលា និងពីសាលាទៅផ្ទះ ដោយសុវត្ថិភាព និងទៀងទាត់ពេលវេលា
-ការបើកបរត្រូវប្រកាន់ខ្ជាប់នូវច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោក
-ត្រួតពិនិត្យបច្ចេកទេសមុននឹងបើក ចេញប្រតិបត្តិការ
-មិនអនុញ្ញាតឲ្យដាក់សិស្សចុះនៅកន្លែងផ្សេងៗពីកន្លែងទទួលយកដោយគ្មានការអនុញ្ញាតពីនាយកសាលា ឬអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្សជាដាច់ខាត។
-លាងជូតពិនិត្យប្រពន្ធ័សុវត្ថិភាពយានយន្តឲ្យបានញឹកញាប់ជៀសវាងប្រការមានបញ្ហានៅពេលបើកបរ។
-រាយការជូនសាលានូវរាល់សកម្មភាពមិនប្រកក្រតីផ្សេងៗជូនដល់សាលាឲ្យបានទាន់ពេល។
-គោរពនិងអនុវត្តតាមបទបញ្ជាផ្សេងៗរបស់សាលាទាក់ទងនឹងសន្តិសុខសុវត្តិភាពរថយន្ត
-ពេលបើកបរត្រូវបិទទ្វារបង្អួចរថយន្តអោយជិតនិងបើកម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់រថយន្តជានិច្ច។
-មុនពេលសិស្សឡើងរថយន្ត៥នាទីត្រូវបញ្ឆេះរថយន្ត និងបើកម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់
-មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាមួយអាណាព្យាបាលសិស្ស និង សិស្សានុសិស្ស
-ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ ។
Job Requirement:
-	បញ្ចាប់ការសិក្សាយ៉ាងទាបចប់ថ្នាក់ទី០៩ 
-	មានប័ណ្ឌបើកបរដែលនៅមានសុពលភាព

Job Description: • Perform routine examinations of patients • Understand patients’ health conditions based on symptoms and tests.• Suggest treatments based on findings.• Give appropriate health service• Set diagnosis based on medical expertise and knowledge.• Access patient’s medical history.• Examine, analyze and interpret lab test results. • Provide different medical treatments, medications and drugs.• Collaborate with team members.• Keep records of patients’ progress and history.• Adhere to laws, rules and regulations.• Refer patients to specialists if necessary.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Keep under review all corporate governance arrangements or developments which might impact the Company to ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trust are fully briefed on these matters and has regard to them when taking decisions.• Provide specialized advice and guidance to Executive and Non-Executive and Managements on all matters of governance, legality, risk, compliance and business conduct and will manage and reconcile conflicting views in relation to governance issues.• Ensure that the Executive and Non-Executive remains compliant with applicable standards of corporate governance and has the necessary infrastructure to support the governance rationale and governance framework.• Ensure that the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, Board’s and each of Trustees and each of their committees conduct their business in compliance with applicable legal and regulatory frameworks and associated codes of governance and practice, and in a manner which is otherwise appropriate for a public body.• Take corporate responsibility for the formulation and implementation of a framework for the development and management of legal and compliance procedural documents (policies, procedures, protocols and guidance) and to ensure its implementation.• Address any non-compliance with the applicable Codes of Conduct and Accountability.• Monitor the suitability and efficacy of risk management provisions and advise on improvements in support of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees ability to make quarterly (or monthly) and annual statements and returns to the Regulator.• Ensure good information flows within the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees and its committees and between senior management, non-executive directors and managements. • Ensure that the requisite types of governance information are made available, either on the company’s website or in documents circulated to stakeholders;• Ensure the preparation, publication, distribution and presentation of the annual report;• Make available, where appropriate, for public inspection:  o A copy of the current constitution, registrations  o A copy of the latest annual accounts and any report of the auditor on those accounts  o A copy of the latest annual report• Ensure that all returns and self-certifications required by monitor, the Independent Regulator, are submitted in full and on time.• Ensure that the company complies with its constitution and that amendments to it are drafted and incorporated in line with correct procedures;• Attend Executive Management Team meetings to ensure congruence between the business of the Executive Management Team.• Bring to the attention of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Board of Trustees any areas of unmanaged risk, or unique risks that are not otherwise addressed;• Ensure that appropriate arrangements are made for the planning and production of agendas, reports and the subsequent minutes for meetings of the Founder, Chairman and CEO, Senior Management, and Boar of Trustees. • Contribute to a range of corporate projects relating to business proposals and developments.Legal Service• Provide a comprehensive Legal Service to deal with legal issues including inquests, employment law, litigation, commercial and contract law, and other judicial processes such as the management of claims arising from clinical negligence, complaints, disciplinary procedures and where relevant, untoward incidents reports and external enquiries;• Manage in-house staff and external legal service contract and associated budgets.• Ensure that appropriate procedures and protocols in place for the management of requests for legal advice and instructions on behalf of the Company;• Establish and communicate procedures for Management to take legal advice if required;
Job Requirement: • Master’s Degree in Law, private law, and corporate law.• 5 years management experience.• Strong knowledge in commercial and business laws, civil code, civil procedure,legal statutes and legislations on construction, development, and land laws.• Khmer and English (other languages are an advantage).• Microsoft Word, Microsoft PowerPoint, Microsoft Excel…• Hand-on legal practitioner.• Relational and People-centered.• Attention to Detail and Focus.• Trustworthy and Professional.• Committed and Loyal.• Highest level of Character and Integrity.• Strong leadership and management skills.

Job Description:
- To handle and prepare shipping documents for exports shipment (FCL, LCL, Air) for custom clearance process.
- Issue HBL, Draft MBL… Etc
- Respond, follow up and update emails with agents, shipping line,  trucking and customers
- Follow up tracking cargo status and timely update to all concern parties
- Be proactive in resolving issues and problems before they occur
- Ensure credit facility before release Bill of Lading 
- To comply with any other new assignment and duties assigned by management
Follow up draft SI ( A to Z )
-Revise, or if any. 
-Update the revised to agent or if any.
-Send draft SI and check MBL with shipping line if any revised.
- Send pre-alert to Singapore, Pusan or other agent if any. 
- Follow up document clearance with Dryport .
- Check Doc clearance before ship on boat, update to shipper if any missing.
-Sign receive all documents.
- Preparing manual invoices 
-bill invoices in system and do it manual then sent it to customers. 
- Check invoices from supplier and book it in system.
-Dry port, shipping line or if any. 
- Preparing booking to shipping line both PNP and SIH.
- Preparing invoice to Singapore and other destination agent.
- Document filling for export per week.
- Preparing loading plans to Dry port, 
- Do weekly report, 
- Provide rate to customer ( if any)
- Update schedule to shipper one per month.
Follow up AFR, ACI ,AMS with shipper
Job Requirement:
- No need Experience  
- Proficiency in Spoken & Written in English
- Good Computer Literate in Microsoft Excel & Outlook
- Passion to Drive Closure & High-Level Customer Service - - - Orientation
- Good Team Player and Interpersonal Skill 
- Well Organize When Working Under Pressure

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Monitor daily, weekly, and monthly channel performance and surface meaningful findings to the management.• Measure and analyze the performance of content across various platforms using multiple online analytics tools.• Visualize and automate data summaries and chart templates for the monthly performance reports.• Measure monthly content performance and deliver data-driven and actionable insights for each channel to guide strategy and programming decisions.• Collaborate with stakeholders to gather additional data points that broaden the analysis and help develop a more comprehensive view of content performance.• Provide frequent social media listening reports, highlighting notable contributors, brand mentions associated to key topics and key trends.• Analyze user engagement (e.g. click-through and bounce rates) and report on web traffic from all social media channels.• Identify online customer habits and suggest means by which to broaden our audience.• Create reports to simply visualize actionable insights of social data for content improvement.• Evaluate digital campaigns and provide analysis on social trends for improvement.• Track campaign performance and metrics and provide reports to management.• Work with social media account manager/admin to identify online influencers on key issues, provide analysis of social landscape, conversation volume, engagement, message velocity, audience demographics, and related dimensions.• Develop and evaluate ways to collect data including opinion polls, questionnaires, and surveys by using digital tools.• Work with executives and stakeholders to propose business and market strategies for new opportunities and improvement.
Job Requirement: • Sales and Demand Planning: demand forecast, forecast variances, salesman performance and customer performance.• Required Research Skills: social research, market research, sampling methodology, research methodology, questionnaire development, data collection, data analysis and reporting.• Marketing Skills: ATL marketing strategy, BTL marketing strategy, branding development and digital marketing strategy.• Product Development: new product development concept and strategy; and product monitoring and evaluation.• Business Development: business development concept, business plan development, business strategical development.• Required Analytical Tools (online/offline): Power BI, SPSS Statistics, Excel or another analytical program. • Required Survey Tools (online/offline): Google Form, Microsoft Form, or other survey tools.

Job Description: ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ-បើកបរដឹកជញ្ជូននំ និង ទំនិញផ្សេងៗទៅតាមសាខា ក្នុងរាជធានីភ្នំពេញ ប្រកបដោយ សុវត្ថិភាព និងគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍- ត្រួតពិនិត្យឡានជាប្រចាំ មានដូចជា ប្រេងម៉ាស៊ីន ទឹក ប្រាំង ចង្កូត កង់ឡាន មុននឹងចេញដំណើរ ព្រមទាំងត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំ តាមកាលវិភាគកំណត់របស់ប្រធានផ្នែកប្រតិបត្តិការ- ត្រូវរាប់ និងផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ទំនិញឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ មុនពេលលើកទំនិញដាក់រថយន្ត និងរក្សាទំនិញក្នុងកន្លែងផ្ទុកឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ- រាយការណ៍ភ្លាមៗមកកាន់ប្រធានក្រុមក្នុងករណីមានបញ្ហាកើតឡើងនៅពេលដឹកជញ្ជូន-ទទួលការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានក្រុម ឬអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និង ថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំ។
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការការងារ-ចេះអានអក្សរខ្មែរបាន-ត្រូវមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរត្រឹមត្រូវស្របតាមច្បាប់-ត្រូវមានជំនាញនិងបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិចមួយឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ-មានការយល់ដឹងអំពីច្បាប់ចរាចរណ៍ផ្លូវគោកតម្រូវការ-មានការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងល្អ និងអាចបត់បែនទៅលើម៉ោងធ្វើការបាន-មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការងារ។-អាចធ្វើការជាក្រុម ម្នាក់ឯង និងអាចធ្វើការងារក្រោមសំពាធបាន។-មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់នៅពេលបើកបរ(បើកបរដោយប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្ពស់និងប្រកបដោយស្មារតីទទួលខុសត្រូវ)។-មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៣:៣០ព្រឹកដល់ ម៉ោង១២:០០រសៀលអត្ថប្រយោជន៏- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារពីរពេល-​ កម្មវិធីខួបកំណើត- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធន- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. job title: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគិតលុយ (សាខាផ្សារថ្មី)
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកគិតលុយ (សាខាផ្សារថ្មី)
Job Description: •  ចេញវិក័យលក់ជូនភ្ញៀវនិងកត់ត្រាចំណូលប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•  បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យទំនិញលក់ចូលទៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធលក់អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ•  ត្រូវមានជំនាញលើការត្រួតពិនិត្យលើក្រដាសប្រាក់ និង មានទេពកោសល្យ ក្នុងការគិតលេខ•  ត្រូវធ្វើការផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់អោយបានច្បាស់លាស់លើ បរិមាណ និងតម្លៃរបស់ទំនិញ នីមួយៗ នៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនគិតប្រាក់•  ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការរាប់សាច់ប្រាក់ជាក់ស្តែងជាមួយទិន្នន័យលក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ•  ត្រូវចេះផ្តល់ជាយោបល់ ឬការណែនាំជូនដល់អតិថិជន អំពីផលិតផលថ្មីៗ ដែលមាននៅក្នុងហាង• ត្រូវមានភាពតស៊ូ ព្យាយាម ជាមួយនឹងការងារ
Job Requirement: •  ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែក ទុតិយភូមិឬ ក្នុងឆ្នាំសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធកាន់តែប្រសើរ•  មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ បើមានរឹតតែល្អ•  ត្រូវមានភាពរហ័សរហួនក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ដែលបានកើតឡើងចំពោះមុខ និងផ្តល់ដំណោះសមហេតុផលជូនអតិថិជន•  មានក្រមសីលធម៏វិជ្ជាជីវះជាបេឡាករ និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• អាចធ្វើការប្តូរវេនតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនម៉ោងការងារ- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏- ម៉ោងការងារ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៥:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល- វេណថ្ងៃ ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ម៉ោង០៩:០០យប់- អាចជ្រើសរើសទៅធ្វើការតាមសាខាបាន ដូចជា ​ សាខាជ្រោយចង្វា សាខាព្រែកព្នៅជាដើម។អត្ថប្រយោជន៏- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារមួយពេល- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ- អត្ថប្រយោជផ្សេងៗទៀត

job title: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្លូវជាតិលេខ3)
company_name: ហាងនំបុ័ងបាយ័ន Bayon Bakery
position: បុគ្គលិកលក់ក្នុងហាង (សាខាផ្លូវជាតិលេខ3)
Job Description:
ទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារ
- រៀបចំទីកន្លែងសម្រាប់ដាក់តាំងផលិតផលលក់
- ពិនិត្យមើលឧបករណ៏សំភារៈក្នុងហាង
- សំអាតទីកន្លែងលក់ខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅហាង
- ទទួលនំតាមកាលកំណត់លក់
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ចំពោះការងារ
- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ចំពោះអតិថិជនគ្រប់ប្រភេទ
- ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗដែលតម្រូវដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
​  តម្រូវការការងារ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់
- មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងបានល្អ
- សិស្សដែលបានបញ្ចប់បាក់ឌុប និងនិស្សិតសិក្សានៅឆ្នាំទី១ ឬទី២ ត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្តឲ្យដាក់ពាក្យ
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft Word & Excel)
- មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ (ប្រសិនជាមានកាន់តែប្រសើរ)
- មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការរៀនពីការងារ ឧស្សាហ៏ព្យាយាម និងឱ្យតម្លៃការងារ
- ធ្លាប់យល់ដឹងនិងរៀនពីការងារនេះខ្លះៗកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- ផ្តល់ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តបន្ថែម
- មានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលការងារជូន មុនចូលធ្វើការ

ម៉ោងការងារ
- ធ្វើការ៦ថ្ងៃ/សប្តាហ៏ ឈប់សំរាក១ថ្ងៃក្នុងមួយសប្តាហ៏
- ម៉ោងការងារ​ វេណព្រឹក ម៉ោង០៥:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល
            វេណល្ងាច ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ម៉ោង០៩:០០យប់
- អាចជ្រើសរើសទៅធ្វើការតាមសាខាបាន ដូចជា សាខាស្តាតចាស់ សាខាផ្សារថ្មី​ សាខាឬស្សីកែវ សាខាព្រែកព្នៅជាដើម។ 

អត្ថប្រយោជន៏
- ការធានារ៉ាប់រងការងារ(បសស)
- ផ្តល់ជូនអាហារមួយពេល
- ទទួលបានការចូលរួមវគ្គសិក្ខាសាលា វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងកម្មវិធីបំពាក់បំប៉នផ្សេងៗ
- មានឱកាសឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្ស តាមសមត្ថភាពការងារ និងបទពិសោធ
- កម្មវិធីជប់លៀងបុគ្គលិកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត

មានតែបេក្ខជនដែលជាប់ក្នុងបញ្ជីសម្រាំងប៉ុណ្ណោះនឹងត្រូវបានទាក់ទងសម្រាប់ការសំភាសន៍។ សូមផ្ញើរប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ របស់អ្នកទុកជាឯកសារមួយ។ ដាក់ឈ្មោះឯកសាររបស់អ្នកដូចតទៅ: ឈ្មោះ_មុខដំណែងស្នើសុំ_កាលបរិច្ឆេទដាក់ពាក្យ (ឈ្មោះ = ឈ្មោះពេញរបស់អ្នក) ។ ឧទាហរណ៏: លី ដារ៉ា_បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកលក់_ថ្ងៃទី30 ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ2019។ សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនឹងអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណ សំបុត្រកំណើត និងសៀវភៅគ្រួសារដែលមានភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប និងលិខិតចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍។

job title: West Coast International School Coordinator Secretary
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: West Coast International School Coordinator Secretary
Job Description: - Reporting to management and performing secretarial and administrative duties.- Typing, formatting, and editing reports, documents, and presentations.- Entering data, maintaining databases, and keeping records.- Managing internal and external correspondence on behalf of management.- Scheduling appointments, maintaining an events calendar, and sending reminders.- Copying, scanning, and faxing documents, as well as taking notes.- Preparing facilities for scheduled events and arranging refreshments, if required.- Observing best business practices and etiquette.- Translation Written and Verbal.
Job Requirement: - Cambodian Nationality - Willing to travel- Must be fluent in both English and Khmer (especially in writing)- A Bachelor's degree in Administration, English Literature, or related fields- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to use initiative- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, and religious views- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite - Strong administrative and organizational skillsHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564For more information about other job opportunities, follow us below: https://t.me/mjqjobs
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. job title: Assistant Manager, Policy Service and Claims
position: Assistant Manager, Policy Service and Claims
Job Description:
* The Employee is responsible for:
- Verify all the claim documents received, ensure the claim assessment, responding and follow up the out-standing claim documents with Sale/Claimant.
- Ensure all claim assessments and its claim payment processes are compliant with policies terms and conditions, company’s policies and procedures as well as applicable law and regulations, and industry best practice.
- Produce the claim notice & summary, the claim payment amount request process done promptly, accurately, timely disbursement of claim payment to claimant.
- Ensure the effective communication, sound judgement, initiative-taking with sale team, claimant, and other related parties, such as hospital/clinics doctor, bank
partners, local authority, witness…to ensure gathering with the compete information needed to the optimum claim results with efficient turnaround time.
- Initiating or conducting the on-site and off-side claim investigation enquires of questionable claims.
- Consultation with underwriter function, reinsures for claim assessment, confer with legal compliance and other related peer’s departments.
- Create or invent any initiative idea to make the claim and policy service process become more convenient and digital base by reducing manual work.
- Work closely with team members to provide the supporting, to update the claim and PS manual, to provide/update training materials/ presentation.
- Review and streamline changes to claims/PS processes, guidelines, and any related its documents/forms.
- Review and control the premium collections form all payment gateways, and record them into the systems in timely, and accurately.
- Manage and reconcile the cash applied, cash refund, and daily reports.
- Review, verify and process the PS documents requested from customer/sale, and to ensure the out-standing documents are managed and recorded into systems.
- Engage and coordinate with payment gateways partners to expand and improve our payment processes.
- Provide the efficient administrative support to team members, such as reporting, filling, tracking.
- Perform other tasks assigned by the line manager.
Job Requirement:
- Medical Doctor, or Bachelor’s degree of accounting, Finance and Banking, and or other degrees related are also acceptable.
- At least 3 years of experience in claim in life insurance or general insurance, and or underwriting in life insurance, financial industry.
- Be able to visit hospital, police station or provinces to convince with professional communication to get the claim documents.
- Be able to face and handle customer’s concerns and inputs, with calm and profession.
- Knowledge of excel for working on reporting is prefer
- Creative and initiative in enhancing the working process.
- Excellence interpersonal, good at communication, flexible and problems solving
- Commitment and responsibility
- Knowledge of excel for working on reporting is prefer
Company Profile:
We are one of the leading Japanese Life Insurance company with more than 100 years of history in the life insurance industry, with an extensive international business network in various countries around the world.  We are recruiting to add onto our team of pioneers in the operations department to support our business growth in Cambodia.

Job Description: - Support on all recruitment activities of the assigned campuses.- Support some functions in the part of compensation and benefits as required from Central Office.- Collecting data and generate into analytical report and propose recommendation and solutions based on the report.- Assist in overviewing the organizational structure of each business unit and department as well as to clarify on the manpower planning to Head of department if needed.- Deal with organizational, people, and change-related issues.- Reinforce on implementation on HR Policies and Procedures for the entire company.- Overview on the human resources risks and inform to higher management for pro-active action.- Conduct quarterly audit to the assigned campuses.- Assist HR Business Partner Manager to work with business operators to ensure the company’s workforce of the assigned campuses has the right size, shape, HR cost and agility for the future.- Resolve daily HR issues with line managers and department heads at the assigned campuses.- Coordinate in KPI Setting for staff and performance evaluation process located at the assigned campuses.- Provide guidance to related departments and employees on HR processes and HR policies located at the assigned campuses.- Assist in staff disciplinary actions located at the assigned campuses.- Work with Department Head and compensation and benefit team to retain talents in the Company through initiation rewarding and recognition programs.- Coordinate in employee relations programs such as team building activities, staff parties, and other social activities to increase the favourable working culture in the Company. - Job Description: - Oversee daily operations of six Intercon Bookstores and one central warehouse.- Develop, implement and review operational policies and procedures.- Develop and update standard operating procedures (SOP) for Intercon Bookstore.- Ensure staff follows standard operating procedures for all operational functions.- Coordinate activities that affect operational decisions and business requirements.- Work with both Aii Language Center (Aii) and American Intercon School (AIS) to make sure   that all school supplies are available and on time for students.- Develop and execute the business strategy plan in order to promote their products as   well as to expand the existing businesses.- Develop and implements systems and processes (POS System) to establish and maintain   records for the operation unit.- Keep track of staffing requirements, hire and train new talent as needed to correspond   with specific duties and skill sets.- Maintain safe and healthy work environment by establishing, following and enforcing   standards and procedures and complying with legal regulations.- Plan, schedule, and review workload and manpower to make sure targets are being met on a   cost-effective basis.- Work with the senior managements to determine values and mission, and plan for short and   long-term goals.- Communicate customer issues with staff and develop ways of improving the customer   experience, including resolving problems and complaints.- Manage work assignment and allocation for staff.- Prepare budget plan.- Monitor and control expense according to allotted budget.- Review daily and monthly sale and sale return reports. - Job Description:
-	Delivering the vision and mission of the school
-	Improving the educational outcomes of students
-	Developing the quality of teaching and learning
-	Nurturing positive relationships between students, teachers, the community, and stakeholders 
-	Lead the school community to develop, articulate and commit to shared educational vision focused on providing quality learning outcomes for all students. 
-	Uphold stewardship as a value based, ethical and moral activity.
-	Embed socially just practices in daily school life.
-	Set high standards for student and staff performance.
-	Actively participate in lifelong learning and ongoing professional development.
-	Form partnerships with parents and community groups.
-	Understand the legislation and policies that impact schooling.
-	Manage resources to achieve goals.
Job Requirement:
*	Qualifications and Experiences
-	Bachelor’s degree in education / education Leadership, Master’s preferred.
-	Professional Teaching qualification/license/certification as applicable
-	Previous experience in a leadership role, preferably as a Principal or Vice Principal in an international or bilingual kindergarten and/or primary school setting.

*	Knowledge, Skills, Abilities and Other Requirements:
-	High levels of personal integrity.
-	Conscientious and able to focus on completing work to a consistently high standard.
-	Flexible and positive approach to work.
-	Excellent organizational and time-management skills; high attention to detail.
-	Ability to work to tight deadlines and able to prompt others to ensure deadlines are achieved.
-	Adaptable to working in a fast paced ever changing environment.
-	Ability to work under pressure and remain calm.
-	Self-motivated and enthusiastic.
-	Continually strive for improvement.
Company Profile: Greenfield International School is a place where diversity is celebrated and unity is nurtured. We take bold steps in embracing both scientific and artistic values of education, as articulated in our well-balanced syllabuses. Through PreK-12 levels, students participates actively in the learning process, developing strong conceptual grounds and asking probing questions to drive innovative thinking. Healthy competitions and collaboration are interwoven realities of student life.

Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

4- Jewel A Development Co., Ltd.
5- Agri-Oral Joint Cooperate Co., Ltd.
6- Public Housing Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.
7- PH One Development (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description:
- Welcome guest check-in/out
- Answer all guest questions and incoming calls
- Responds to telephone and in-person inquiries regarding reservations, hotel information, and guest concerns
- Resolve guest issues, complaints, problems in a quick and efficient manner to maintain a high level of customer satisfaction and quality service
- Be able to perform all duties of guest services and assist at front desk as needed
- Be Friendly, flexible for working hour, and be able to speak and present in public
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Administrative or related field
- Experience in customer service or cashier is a plus
- Able to speak English, can speak Chinses is a plus
- Able to use computer Microsoft office and email

-​ វេនធ្វើការ៖ ម៉ោង០៧:០០ព្រឹក ដល់ ០៤:០០រសៀល, ម៉ោង០១:០០រសៀល ដល់ ១០:០០យប់, ម៉ោង១០:០០យប់ ដល់ ០៧:០០ព្រឹក

Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com 22nd Floor, Diamond Twin Tower, Koh Pich, Sangkat Tonle Bassac Khan Chamkamorn, Phnom Penh Cambodia 081 990 959
