job title: Customs Broker-ភ្នាក់ងារជើងសារគយ
position: Customs Broker-ភ្នាក់ងារជើងសារគយ
Job Description:
•	Portray a professional, courteous and helpful attitude in all dealings with customers
•	Support with the practical experience and knowledge in daily activities to achieve goals and objectives
•	Liaise with customs officials on specific duties payable and problem shipments.
•	Coordinate with Terminal Operator about manifest amendment
•	Comply with the regulatory policy and rules to make DHL as reliable business partners
•	Build-up the co-operative relationship with the practical levels in HUB & Gateway and provide the positive attitude /solution when necessary
•	Ensure and review the accurate preparation of import and export Customs declarations and data in timely provision
•	Analyze and investigate mistakes occurred
•	Resolve specific disputes or provide advice on technical issues with internal customers.
•	Maintain and ensure a thorough knowledge of Customs practices and procedures
•	Coordinate with DHL networks for additional info, paper work, Customs related issues
•	Coach, educate and train team members in Customs knowledge
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor Degree in Business Administration, Law or related field is required. 
•	Customs Broker certified by General Department of Customs and Excise is preferred. 
•	Good in Speaking/Reading/Writing English is required.
•	Good Computer Skills: MS Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet Email
•	2 – 3 years relevant experience of working with customs clearance matters within transportation, logistics or import / export industry.
•	Ability to negotiate and deal with government officer / Customer and other parties.  

DHL Express (Cambodia) Office:  Unit 575 A, B, & C, of California Social House, 571 – 575 Russian Federation Boulevard, Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Email address:  apecexpress-khrecruitment@dhl.com 
Shall you have any inquiries regarding the post, please contact 023 992 618 (Ext: 814 & 822). Only short listed candidates will be notified.
Company Profile: Our company, DHL Express (Cambodia) Ltd., is the global market leader in international express delivery services with offices in more than 220 countries and territories worldwide. More than 100,000 employees are dedicated to providing fast and reliable services that exceed customers’ expectations. Visit our website www.dhl.com for more information.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023 992 618  apecexpress-khrecruitment@dhl.com Building 575 A-B-C, Russian Boulevard, Teuk Thla, Sen Sok, Phnom Penh.  023 992 618

Job Description: • Reviewing marketing research results to determine whether they indicate a need for changes in the company’s products or services.• Oversee new and ongoing marketing and advertising activities.• Monitor product distribution and consumer reactions.• Devise innovative growth strategies.• Align the company around the brand’s direction, choices, and tactics.• Reviewing and approving all advertisements created by the advertising agency before they are published or aired.• Creating and managing an effective advertising campaign, including planning the budget and timelines, hiring staff, and overseeing production.• Setting up meetings with potential clients to present ideas and proposals for new products or services.• Managing the production of all marketing materials, including brochures, catalogs, magazines, direct mail pieces, and other print materials.• Evaluating the effectiveness of campaigns to ensure that they are meeting their goals.• Coordinating all aspects of a product launch from concept to production to distribution to ensure that it meets company goals and targets the correct audience.• Developing marketing strategies that will increase brand awareness and generate sales.• Writing speeches or articles that promote the company’s products and services or explaining company policies to employees.• Other tasks assigned.

job title: Barista​ បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកឆុងកាហ្វេ
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Barista​ បុគ្គលិកផ្នែកឆុងកាហ្វេ
Job Description: Barista ធ្វើការនៅហាងកាហ្វេ ឬព្រឹត្តិការណ៍ពិសេសដើម្បីបង្កើនការលក់ និងទាក់ទាញអតិថិជនដោយផ្តល់ជូននូវភេសជ្ជៈកាហ្វេដែលមានគុណភាពជាច្រើនប្រភេទ។ ភារកិច្ចរបស់ពួកគេរួមមានការទទួលការបញ្ជាទិញពីអតិថិជន ការរៀបចំ និងការបម្រើភេសជ្ជៈ និងអាហារ និងជួយធានាថាអ្នកទស្សនាទទួលបាននូវបទពិសោធន៍ដ៏រីករាយ និងសម្រាកកាយ។- ការអនុវត្តន៍តាមគោលការណ៍- បោះពុម្ព ឬសរសេរវិក្កយបត្រជូនអតិថិជន- ប្រមូលសាច់ប្រាក់ ឬតាមកាតឥណទាន- ធានាការអនុលោមតាមបទប្បញ្ញត្តិនៃសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារខេត្ត ឬខេត្ត- រៀបចំស៊ុបនំសាំងវិច កុម្មង់នំ និងរបស់របរ- ជំនាញពិសេសជាមួយឧបករណ៍ និងជួសជុលនៅពេលចាំបាច់
Job Requirement: - ជំនាញសេវាកម្មអតិថិជនឆ្នើម- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អជាលាយលក្ខណ៍អក្សរ និងពាក្យសំដី- ការយល់ដឹងអំពីគណិតវិទ្យាមូលដ្ឋាន- ជំនាញសុវត្ថិភាព និងការរៀបចំអាហារ និងចំណេះដឹងអំពីរបៀបដែលមេរោគ និងបាក់តេរីអាចរីករាលដាល- សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការបង្កើតភេសជ្ជៈកាហ្វេថ្មីៗ- ស្គាល់ពីបទប្បញ្ញត្តិសុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារក្នុងតំបន់ការងារ Barista ភាគច្រើនទាមទារយ៉ាងហោចណាស់អនុវិទ្យាល័យមួយចំនួន រួមជាមួយនឹងការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលលើការងារ។ មុខតំណែងខ្លះទាមទារការបញ្ជាក់សុវត្ថិភាពចំណីអាហារផងដែរ។ និស្សិតសាកលវិទ្យាល័យ ឬអនុវិទ្យាល័យជាច្រើនធ្វើការជា Baristas ខណៈពេលដែលទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដែលត្រូវការសម្រាប់មុខរបរផ្សេងទៀត ប៉ុន្តែអ្នកផ្សេងទៀតធ្វើការក្នុងមុខតំណែងនេះព្រោះវាជាតួនាទីដ៏ល្អរបស់ពួកគេ។សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939,
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

•	ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែប្រសើរ

job title: ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ (Sale)
position: ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ (Sale)
Job Description:
•	លក់អោយគ្រប់ថាកេត (Target))
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ

•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ឆ្លាតវៃ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម
•	អត់ធ្មត់នឹងសម្ពាធការងារ
•	អាចចុះលក់តាមខេត្តបាន

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍
•	ប្រាក់ខែអាចចរចារបាន

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - To involve a creative and systematic plan to solve a problem or achieve certain objectives, with the use of images, symbols or even words. It is visual communication and the aesthetic expression of concepts and ideas.- Revise and study project drawings, and determine, in coordination with Project Manager, relevant staffing needs to fulfill the design/shop-drawing related aspects of the project efficiently and effectively.- Compare the project’s architectural and civil drawings to identify any gaps or conflicts, coordinate with Engineering Coordinator to tackle those issues.- Conduct frequent meetings with the project’s client/consultant to coordinate the project’s architectural needs and requirements, solve any problems, or clarify technical issues.- Support and supervise Junior Shop Drawing engineers (in head office and on site) to provide technical assistance and/or review, verify, and check drawings, forms, and designs.- Prepare technical shop drawings, whenever required, on paper and digital format that respond to set technical specifications and quality standards, and conform to recognized procedures.- Liaise with projects’ sites teams to identify common inquiries, and send Request For Information (RFIs) for the project consultant, to seek clarification regarding technical specifications and requirements.- Conduct an initial Quantity Survey (QS) to support the Procurement department in determining the needed quantities to plan for subcontractors’ deals; and provide clarification for QS team on site whenever needed.- Write and submit a monthly report for each project to the Project Manager and/or Engineering Manager to monitor and evaluate the project’s technical progress and performance with regards to Shop Drawing and Design.- Report to the Project Manager and/or Engineering Manager, on frequent basis, the project’s technical progress and performance about Shop Drawing and Design.- Liaise with Senior Contracts & Invoices Engineer to provide relevant information needed for setting up and formulating contracts.- Obtain and assemble all technical information, data, and drawings needed from relevant departments for full coordination of Shop Drawing across the Civil/Structure, Architectural, and Mechanical, Electrical, and Plumbing (MEP) architectural designs.- Responsible for the coordination between all disciplines.- Others assigned by manager or head of department.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor's degree in an architectural.- At least 4 years of experience in construction and design fields.- In-depth understanding of operations, production and design.- Can assess project plans and construction specifications.- Good command of reading, writing and speaking English is a plus.- Proficiency in computer skills program MS office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft project), AutoCAD, REVIT, Sketup, Vray, 3D max, Photoshop and other involved programs.- Demonstrate positive and flexible attitude and high commitment.- Passionate about building environment and care about people and environment.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh #11A, St. 402 Sangkat Tomnup teuk, Khan ChomkaMorn. phnom penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)

Job Requirement: - មានបរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រង ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ ផ្នែកទំនាក់ទំនង ឬសញ្ញាបត្រសមមូល- មានចំណេះដឹងលើភាសាបរទេស​ (ភាសាអង់គ្លេស...) KNOWLEDGE,  SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE / ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍- មានចំណេះដឹងខាងផ្នែកព័ត៌មានវិទ្យាប្រើប្រាស់បានលើកម្មវិធី៖​ Ms. Words, Ms. Excels, Internet, Email- មានសមត្ថភាពប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងមានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង- ស្គាល់អំពីតម្រូវការទីផ្សារការងារ និងបរិស្ថានជុំវិញ- ឆ្លងកាត់បទពិសោធន៍លើការងារយ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ- មានលទ្ធភាព/សមត្ថភាពក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងលើការងារប្រតិបត្តិដោយឯករាជ្យ ម្ចាស់​ការ ទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ និង​ទាមទារការគ្រប់គ្រងតិចតូចពីគណៈគ្រប់គ្រង។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Process the new student placement test, invigilate, mark the test and contact the interviewer to conduct the interview.• Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Input students’ results into database system and commit to human-error-free work.• Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. • Move Aii students who have paid school fee for semester or year to the next term.• Ensure the staff and student ID cards are issued on time and record and report of ID card issuance including broken ID card for Administration Supervisor (AS). Frequently check with warehouse about ID card and ensure it must not run out of stock.• Be in charge of organizing events either inside or outside the organization/school. Make sure proper checklist of items used in each event are recorded and return back to stock when the event’s finished.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of American Intercon School.• Conduct the student’s opinion survey of Aii Language Center. • Record and process meeting minutes and other documents for all departments when required.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts.• Make sure new term preparation checklist is done at least one week for the term starts. Drinking water, coffee, tea and other materials must be checked and report to Administration Supervisor.• Design for internal use.• And other assigned tasks.** Sub-Responsibilities:1. Maintain and record In-and-Out documents, and process In & Out documents to the relevant departments.2. Give reception and make of the Student Certification Letter such as; reference, transcripts, recommendation letter and other official letters.3. Create and update Aii class schedule by term.4. Check and update Office’s stationary and inventory to make sure that they are able to use or replace or lose or buy new.5. Check and update Office’s Fixed Asset to make sure that they have stayed at the same place or moved out.6. Maintaining student’s file and properly keep all documents including application forms, receipts and other necessary documents are kept safely, yet easily accessible when needed. 7. Ensuring the memo, poster, and announcement are posted on the bulletin board regularly.8. Stamping on documents, letter to parents, certificates and other official documents.9. Printing monthly attendance sheet for Aii at the end of the month.10. Design for internal use.11. And other assigned tasks.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor Degree in Management, Education or other related fields.• Administrative and Organizational Skills• Experienced in dealing with administrative affairs in school or education field• Be able to use office applications including Word, Excel, Power Point, and E-mail.• Be able to communicate with team and can complete work with tight timelines and multiple deadlines.**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: - Develop investor confidence and belief in the company’s vision and strategy for delivering shareholder value- Communicate and disseminate information to current and potential investors - Communicate to management about key concerns from significant stakeholders and propose solutions. - Take part in producing quarterly and annual reports - Manage Investor Relations on company’s websites and other platforms  - Oversees all disclosures and reports before submitting to the regulator and publication to public- Create and manage a strong reputation by demonstrating consistent and clear communication between internal and external parties- Manage equity research and investor relationships- Provide insights on market activity and present them to the leadership team- Analyze and present financial trends, competitor behavior, shareholder issues, and anything else that could impact the business- Responsible for overseeing and managing quarterly earnings and conference calls- Work with legal counsel to ensure compliance on regulatory matters- Other tasks assigned by the line manager / SFD and CEO / Chairman
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree or Master Degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, Law or ACCA- Comprehensive understanding of finance, accounting practices and public relation- Experience in dealing with regulators (preferably CSX and SERC) and customers - Good understanding of Cambodian laws and corporate governance imposed on listed companies - Strong skills in mitigation, relationship building and problem solving- Ability to meet deadlines with strong attention to consistency, detail, and quality- Excellent written and oral communication skills- Fluent in English and Khmer  - At least 5 years of experience in finance and accounting / audit / advisory / analysis and relevant experience with a large corporation- Recent employment of at least 2 years at a listed company or service providers to listed companies is preferred- Recent employment of at least 3 years at a securities firm or other relatable professional firms is preferredHow to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT),Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.khTelegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564For more information about other job opportunities, follow us below: https://t.me/mjqjobs

Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078330733 talent@songsaa.com Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap, Preah Sihanouk 078330733

company_name: Howard Johnson Plaza by Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville
Job Description:
1. To assist the Engineering Manager to maintain the integrity of the hotel physical facilities including proper operation, maintenance of M&E plants and installation, fire and life safety, physical security of the building, FF&E.
2. To ensure the correct, efficient and timely operation and maintenance of all M&E services under the guidance of Engineering Manager. To provide technical support and to lead and supervise in fault diagnosis and trouble shooting.
3. To perform all other duties as may be assigned by Engineering Manager.
4. To responsible for the implementation of polices & procedures as follows:
	preventive maintenance program
	fire & life safety program
	work request program
	energy conservation program
	safety tag program
	water treatment program
	training program for associates directly under his supervision
	parts and materials control
	physical security program
5. To ensure that all established rules, regulations, p& p are strictly adhered to.
6. Constantly evaluate the systems, plants operation for modification and improvement.
7. To develop preventive maintenance schedule plan and requirement based on labor availability, business cycle, seasonal considerations, code requirement, etc 
To determine materials availability for preventive maintenance with sufficient lead-time for acquisition.
8. To perform emergency duties as per outline in the hotel emergency procedure.
9. To maintain professional and cooperative relationships with other operating department and all associates within engineering department.
10. To make daily, weekly and monthly work assignment as regards to repairs and preventive maintenance and to follow through until work is completed in a satisfactory manner.
11. To establish priorities of preventive maintenance based on factors such as importance of equipment/system to business or operation, repair or replacement cost, safety factor, recent repair history, etc.
12. To update preventive maintenance tasks, frequencies, labor & material estimates, special conditions, etc. 
13. Constantly determines opportunity for improving productivity and quality from associates in term of utilization, methods and performance.
14. To assist the executive assistance in store management and inventory control. To involve in parts, materials sourcing and quality checking.
15. To assist in coordinating and execution of special projects and contractual work
Job Requirement:
1. Diploma in mechanical or electrical engineering or equivalent.
2. Min. 5 years’ experience in hotel engineering operation in similar capacity, preferably with international hotel chain.
3. Ability to communicate in both oral and written English & Chinese

Job Description: 1. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការថែទាំ និងជួសជុល កម្រិតស្រាលលើ ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក អគ្គិសនី ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់  ម៉ាស៊ីនភ្លើង ជួសជុលទូទៅ ព្រមទាំងសម្ភារបរិក្ខារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗក្នុងអគារ ឱ្យមានសោភ័ណភាព និងមានដំណើរការល្អ និងយល់ពីវិធីសាស្ត្រទប់ស្កាត់ និងសង្រ្គោះពេលមានអគ្គិភ័យ ឬផ្ទុះសេខ្សែភ្លើងជាដើម។ 2. ទទួលខុសត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារសម្រាប់ជួសជុលដែលនៅក្នុងឃ្លាំងឱ្យមានភាពគង់វង្ស។3. ធ្វើជាជំនួយការ ការងារអ្នកបច្ចេកទេសដូចជា៖ ជាងម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ជាងអគ្គិសនី ជាងសំណង់ ជាងជួសជុលទូទៅ ជាងដែក ជាងឈើ ជាងបាញ់ថ្នាំ ជាងសម្អាតលម្អិត កំចាត់សត្វល្អិត សួន នៅពេលណាមួយខ្វះកម្លាំងអាចយកទៅបំពេញបានពេលទំនេរពីការងារ។4. អនុវត្តផែនការដែលប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក និងអនុប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកដាក់ឱ្យ ឱ្យបាន១០០ ភាគរយ។5. ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារដែលខ្លួនបានធ្វើឱ្យបាន១០០ ភាគរយ។6. ត្រូវមានទំនាក់ទំនង និងការសហការល្អជាមួយផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។I. ការងារទទួលខុសត្រូវប្រចាំថ្ងៃ1. ទទួលការងារផ្សេងៗពីផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដោះស្រាយឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលា ទៅតាមទំហំការងារជាក់ស្តែង2. ធ្វើការងារជួសជុលសម្ភារផ្សេងៗប្រចាំថ្ងៃ នៅក្នុងអគារដែលមានបញ្ហា។3. ដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យមើល បរិវេណជុំវិញក្នុង និងក្រៅអគារ សណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់  សោភ័ណភាព សុវត្ថិភាព ឧបករណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការ និងបរិស្ថានក្នុងអគារទាំងមូល និងកត់ត្រារាល់ចំណុចខូចខាតត្រូវដោះស្រាយភ្លាមៗ ឬទុកធ្វើថ្ងៃបន្ទាប់ ជាក់ស្តែងហើយត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ជូនប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក និងផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ៖ - សោភ័ណភាពៈ ភាពគ្មានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ ស្នាមប្រឡាក់  ថ្នាំត្រូវជួសជុល សម្ភារដាក់ខុសកន្លែង ។ល។ - សុវត្ថិភាពៈ ការដ្ឋានមិនរៀបរយ  ខ្សែភ្លើង កុងតាក់ភ្លើង ឌុយដោត  ដែកស្រួច Smoke Alarm អំពូល អាសន្ន  ម៉ូទ័រទឹកពន្លត់អគ្គីភ័យ សម្ភារដែលអាចធ្លាក់ពីលើ ទ្វារ ទ្វាររមូរ ទ្វារជណ្តើរអាសន្ន បង្អួច របងជុំវិញអគារ (ចាក់សោរត្រឹមត្រូវ) ទូរសព្ទប្រកាសអាសន្ន និងកណ្តឹងក្នុងជណ្តើរយន្ត។ល។ - ឧបករណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិការៈ ជណ្តើរយន្ត ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ កង្ហារ អំពូលភ្លើង អំពូលហ្វារ អំពូលឡូហ្គូ អំពូលការពារយន្តហោះ ភ្លើងស្តែនបាយ ប្រព័ន្ធផ្តល់សញ្ញាពេលមានចោរផ្លោះរបងចូលអគារដំណើរការល្អ (Intruder Sensor) តុ និងកៅអីសិស្ស។ល។ - បរិស្ថានៈ ភាពកខ្វក់ ក្លិនមិនល្អ សំរាម ធុងសំរាម សត្វមូស បន្ទប់ទឹក និងទីតាំងចំណតត្រូវតែស្អាត ករណីបើពិនិត្យឃើញថាបើមានឃើញចំណុចបញ្ហា ត្រូវរបាយការណ៍ទៅក្រុមការងារផ្នែកសុវត្ថិភាពសាលា និងសាធារណៈ ដើម្បីឱ្យជួយដោះស្រាយ។4. ត្រួតពិនិត្យសម្ភារជាងមុនពេលចូលធ្វើ និងកំពុងធ្វើ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារជាងពេលធ្វើរួច។5. ទទួលការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក និងឆ្លើយតបទៅប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកពេលការងារបញ្ចប់។6. ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ឬរៀបចំបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ហើយប្រគល់ជូនអនុប្រធាន ឬប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែក។7. ពេលទំនេរពីការងារ ត្រូវជួយតាមផ្នែកដែលត្រូវការកម្លាំង សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃស្អែក និងបន្ទាន់ខ្លំាងភ្លាមៗ។8. ឆែកតេលេក្រាម (Telegram) នៅតាមអគាររៀងៗខ្លួន ក្រុមដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីទទួលការងារ និងដើម្បីទទួលបានព័ត៌មាន។9. រៀងរាល់ពេលដែលមាន ភ្លៀងត្រូវដើរត្រួតពិនិត្យមើល ដំបូល បង្អួច ប្រព័ន្ធលូ ទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗ ចៀសវាងករណីលេចជ្រាប ឬសាចទឹក បណ្តាលឱ្យខូចសម្ភារ និងដើម្បីតាមដានហើយជួសជុលបន្ត។ល។10. បើកសម្ភារពីឃ្លាំងពេលមានតម្រូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។II. ការងារទទួលខុសត្រូវជាទម្លាប់1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារទូទៅប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍៖   - សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារស្នាក់នៅសាលាត្រូវត្រួតពិនិត្យរៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃសៅរ៍។   - សម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកថែទំាអគារបុគ្គលិកខាងក្រៅត្រួតពិនិត្យថ្ងៃអាទិត្យ។2. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យឧបករណ៍បន្លឺសំឡេងពេលមានបញ្ហា  (Smoke Alarm) រៀងរាល់ (ថ្ងៃទី១៥ និងថ្ងៃទី៣០)។3. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យដំបូលអគាររៀងរាល់(ថ្ងៃទី១៥ និងថ្ងៃទី៣០)។4. ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗ កន្លែងលោកប្រធាន រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃចន្ទពេលរសៀល ចន្លោះម៉ោង (0២:00PM -0៥:00PM)។5. ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃផ្ញើចូលគ្រុប (13. Maintenance Unit) ប្រចាំថ្ងៃចុងម៉ោងពេលរសៀល។6. កត់ត្រារបាយការណ៍ ទឹក ភ្លើង អតិថិជនខាងក្រៅ (កាហ្វេ ស្មាតម៉ាត កន្លែងជួល...) រៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃទី២០ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងគ្រុប (Space Rental Utilities Report) ។ 7. ផ្ញើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែមកប្រធានផ្នែករៀងរាល់ចន្លោះថ្ងៃទី០១ដល់ថ្ងៃទី០៦ ឱ្យបានទាន់ពេលវេលាដែលបានកំណត់៖  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យអគារទូទៅប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍។  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យឧបករណ៍បន្លឺសំឡេងពេលមានបញ្ហា (Smoke Alarm)។    - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យដំបូលអគារ។  - បញ្ជីត្រួតពិនិត្យទីតាំងសំខាន់ៗកន្លែងលោកប្រធាន។  - របាយការណ៍លទ្ធផលការងារប្រចាំខែ។
Job Requirement: - បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រឡើងទៅ- មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៥ឆ្នាំឡើង ដល់៥៥ឆ្នាំ- មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារ ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី ប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ ថែទំាគ្រឿងបរិក្ខារ ការងារទូទៅផ្សេងៗ ក្នុងអគារយ៉ាងតិច ២ឆ្នាំ - អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់- មានការព្យាយាម និងភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ- មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ - មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Phnom Penh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: Howard Johnson Plaza by Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville
Job Description:
1. To assist the Engineering Manager to maintain the integrity of the hotel physical facilities including proper operation, maintenance of M&E plants and installation, fire and life safety, physical security of the building, FF&E.
2. To ensure the correct, efficient and timely operation and maintenance of all M&E services under the guidance of Engineering Manager. To provide technical support and to lead and supervise in fault diagnosis and trouble shooting.
3. To perform all other duties as may be assigned by Engineering Manager.

4. To responsible for the implementation of polices & procedures as follows:
	preventive maintenance program
	fire & life safety program
	work request program
	energy conservation program
	safety tag program
	water treatment program
	training program for associates directly under his supervision
	parts and materials control
	physical security program
5. To ensure that all established rules, regulations, p& p are strictly adhered to.
6. Constantly evaluate the systems, plants operation for modification and improvement.
7. To develop preventive maintenance schedule plan and requirement based on labor availability, business cycle, seasonal considerations, code requirement, etc 
	To determine materials availability for preventive maintenance with sufficient lead-time for acquisition.
8. To perform emergency duties as per outline in the hotel emergency procedure.
9. To maintain professional and cooperative relationships with other operating department and all associates within engineering department.
10. To make daily, weekly and monthly work assignment as regards to repairs and preventive maintenance and to follow through until work is completed in a satisfactory manner.
11. To establish priorities of preventive maintenance based on factors such as importance of equipment/system to business or operation, repair or replacement cost, safety factor, recent repair history, etc.
12. To update preventive maintenance tasks, frequencies, labor & material estimates, special conditions, etc. 
13. Constantly determines opportunity for improving productivity and quality from associates in term of utilization, methods and performance.
14. To assist the executive assistance in store management and inventory control. To involve in parts, materials sourcing and quality checking.
15. To assist in coordinating and execution of special projects and contractual work
Job Requirement:
1. Diploma in mechanical or electrical engineering or equivalent.
2. Min. 5 years’ experience in hotel engineering operation in similar capacity, preferably with international hotel chain.
3. Ability to communicate in both oral and written English & Chinese
Company Profile: Howard Johnson Plaza By Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville in an International Five Star Hotel, Located on the independent beach coastline of Sihanouk Ville port, the hotel is designed with originality, elegance, beautiful environment and artistic atmosphere. It is the best choice for your travel, business and leisure.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017437988 recruitment@howardjohnsonsihanoukville.com Independence Beach, Street 2 Thnou, 01 Village, Sangkat 03, Sihanoukville, Kingdom of Cambodia 017437988

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Preparation of individual audit planning – data collection, define key risk concerns, compile activities chart, etc.• Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit;• Conduct investigations of fraud, embezzlement, misconduct;• During the investigative process, provide effective recommendations to identified issues;• Preparation of the consolidated internal audit reports;• Carry out the vision and mission of investigation audit to prevent, detect, and investigate issues of fraud and financial abuse within the company;• Identify, and clearly define, investigation issues and root causes, recommend improved internal controls, business processes, and ensure that corrective action plans are developed;• Promote a zero-tolerance control environment where fraud or noncompliance is unacceptable and difficult to conceal;• Assist to design working program and working paper to implement investigative audit effectively;• Overseeing the investigation planning and audit reporting writing;• Conduct special investigation and high-profile reviews as requested by Board of Director;• Receive special training in fraud;• Focus on functions at MJQE and its subsidiary l such as Aii, Ais, Ais Full Day Program, International School, Cisco Network Academy, ICES Cambodia, MMN, TESOL, PF and so on• Perform other tasks assigned by Manager.

company_name: Howard Johnson Plaza by Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville
Job Description:
1. To ensure all the technicians assigned to the same shift duty carried out their duties accordingly and in accordance to the rules & regulations and policies and procedures.
2. To lead, supervise, assign and follow up the daily work activities, to ensure that all work requests are attended without unduly delay and completed in a professional and efficient manner.
3. To perform all other duties as may be assigned by Chief Engineer, Maintenance Engineer.
To complete detailed shift hand over to the oncoming shift leader, both in written and oral manner. The hand over should include all uncompleted and still in progress work, all equipment that breakdown, status of work request, backlog, working tools, pagers, walkie talkie, keys, parts and materials, etc. 
4. To lookout for the abnormal working condition and take remedial actions accordingly. To report such abnormality to Maintenance Engineer attention.
5. To perform emergency duties as per outlined under hotel emergency procedures. 
6. To response to guest request or complaints promptly and efficiently to avoid inconvenience or discomfort. 
7. To conduct briefing to all members of the shift and checking on attendance and personal grooming 10 minutes before commencing of the shift. 
8 .To maintain a very good working relationship with all associates and needs to be able to listen well with patience and advise the Maintenance engineer and Chief engineer of any problem area. Must promote a cordial and caring attitude and cooperation with all other department. 
9 To ensure that all work requests are properly logged on the work request logbook and it is updated appropriately at the end of each shift duty. 
10 .To maintain tools keys, maintenance equipment, parts and materials for general repairs in guestroom, public and service areas properly.
11. To conduct inspection tour and checking on all the operating systems and plants status according to the check list. To lookout for the abnormal working condition and take remedial actions accordingly. To report such abnormality to Maintenance Engineer attention.
12.To record the inspection and current operating status of all systems and plants. 
13. To check on the readiness of technical support that is being requested for banquet and meeting events. 
14. To check the lighting (indoor and outdoor) status during midnight. To switch off / on all those equipment according to the required time schedule. 
15. To attend to and resolve all operating status alarms generated by the BAS system. 
16. To response with priority in case of elevator stalk.
Job Requirement:
1. Diploma in either Mechanical or Electrical engineering or equivalent.
2. Min. 5 years’ experience in hotel engineering operation in similar capacity, preferably with international hotel chain.
3. Practical experience in the field of M & E system pertaining to hotel operation.
4. Full understanding and knowledge of engineering operation in hotel. 
5. Ability to communicate in both oral and written English & Chinese
Company Profile: Howard Johnson Plaza By Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville in an International Five Star Hotel, Located on the independent beach coastline of Sihanouk Ville port, the hotel is designed with originality, elegance, beautiful environment and artistic atmosphere. It is the best choice for your travel, business and leisure.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  017437988 recruitment@howardjohnsonsihanoukville.com Independence Beach, Street 2 Thnou, 01 Village, Sangkat 03, Sihanoukville, Kingdom of Cambodia 017437988

company_name: Howard Johnson Plaza by Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville
Job Description:
1. To ensure all the technicians assigned to the same shift duty carried out their duties accordingly and in accordance to the rules & regulations and policies and procedures.
2. To lead, supervise, assign and follow up the daily work activities, to ensure that all work requests are attended without unduly delay and completed in a professional and efficient manner.
3. To perform all other duties as may be assigned by Director of Engineering and Duty Engineer.
4. Responsible for the maintenance & repair of all the mechanical equipment or systems of hotel, including:
•	Water Supply
•	Sewage Drainage
•	Laundry Room and Kitchen equipment
•	Gas Supply Working Network
•	Fire-fighting alarm system
•	Appliance, Meter
5. Make regular examination of the equipment to make sure the maintenance task carried out and completed reasonably on schedule. 
6. Make daily inspection.
7. To lookout for the abnormal working condition and take remedial actions accordingly. To report such abnormality to Duty Engineer.
8. Establish protection and maintenance procedure.
9. Manage all the installation related to hotel’s machine and systems.
10. Handle guest complain or requirement politely.
11. Cooperate with or support the subcontract company or construction team work till the end of the engineering project.
12. To conduct briefing to all members of the shift and checking on attendance and personal grooming 10 minutes before commencing of the shift. 
13. Conduct staffs to keep clean and tidy appearance and obey the healthy sanitary standards, checking staffs appearance and sanitary reach the formal standards or not.
14. To maintain a very good working relationship with all associates and needs to be able to listen well with patience and advise the Duty Engineer and Director of Engineering of any problem area. Promote a cordial and caring attitude and cooperation with all other departments. 
15. Make good preparation for admitting the new member according to engineering training principle, assist Duty Engineer to list the work and training schedule for them and ensure every green have the opportunity of to attend the training. Impart the knowledge of own specialty to hotel’s staff and guide to repair machines and operate systems.
16. Oversee the maintenance man, delegate tasks or authorize maintenance man to carry out repair task, check and make sure all the assigned tasks completed according to the standard. Discuss additional staff force or overtime problem with Duty Manager.
17. Attend engineering internal meeting，in which transfer important information of Eng and hotel to engineering members, report problems, difficulty and completion status to the superior and make discussion with other members of Engineering.
18. To ensure that all work requests are properly logged on the work request logbook and it is updated appropriately at the end of each shift duty.

Company Profile: 致立投资集团有限公司（以下简称致立集团）成立于1998年，总部位于中国广东省东莞市。旗下企业包括东莞致立节能机电有限公司、惠州致立机电有限公司、香港保志实业有限公司、柬埔寨致立机电有限公司、柬埔寨华南达机电有限公司、柬埔寨荣泰贸易有限公司、印度尼西亚致立机电有限公司等，是一家实力雄厚的多元化新型民营企业。凭借在机电行业丰富的生产技和销售经验，与国际一流品牌合作，为客户提供高品质的石油产品和完善的电力系统集成解决方案。公司业务遍及于中国和东南亚地区，客户群涵盖航空运输、电信、矿山、油田、房地产、酒店娱乐、制造业、养殖业等众多行业。

Job Description:
About Job:
This role is responsible for marketing and selling credit cards to customers. The salesperson identifies potential buyers and convinces them to buy credit cards. He/she does this by explaining the benefits the buyer will gain from purchasing the products.

What you will do:
•	Involves marketing and selling credit cards to consumers 
•	Prior Customer Support and/or customer success experience 
•	Strong verbal and written English Communication 
•	Ability or organize, break down, and clearly articulate complex thoughts, ideas, and instruction 
•	Strong ability to take initiative and confidently direct customer interactions 
•	Enjoys circumstances where the right answer isn’t always obvious and gets satisfaction out of helping others.  
•	Able to separate themselves in frustrating situations and guide customers to efficient solutions 
•	Strong organizational and time management skills 
•	Oversee/supervise partner/sales outlets by assigning area  
•	Ensure the quality of the network for customer satisfaction  
•	Facilitate reliable delivery of marketing materials to outlets  
•	Manage retail outlet to ensure those necessary customer documents/contracts are returned within the set timeline  
•	Prepare regular visit call plan to ensure the relationship and check and balance is in place  
•	Provide full hands support on matters related to product inquiries, application malfunctions, and other issues partners/sales shall raise  
•	Be a key contact person in your own area always to ensure sales can connect for support  
•	Perform and execute following the field visit guideline as briefed and assigned by superior  
•	Ability to work in a self-directed way 
•	Perform other tasks as assigned by superior
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s Degree in business administration, Marketing, Management, or related field 
•	At least 3-4 years experience in sales relationships in banking/fintech or other related fields 
•	Understand an overview of a competitive market in digital payment 
•	Understand the role of retail/agent/merchant/bill payment in the fintech industry 
•	Ability to effectively manage, and handle multiple deadlines, and complex issues 
•	Positive and self-confident attitude 
•	Possess a sense of urgency 
•	Excellent in English languages 
•	Good presentation skills 
•	Planning and budgeting 
•	Effective communication skills 
•	Outgoing personality 
•	Strong and elevated level of relationship building

Job Description: - Understand the product sales out in the field via face to-face interactions with both potential and existing customers and providing hands-on explanations of any new or updated schedule and pricing to business partners when necessary.  - Call for appointment with business corporate partners (TA/TO, hotel, guesthouse, referral partner) and so and so in purpose to do the business corporate agreement with MOU. - Build good relationship existing customers and corporate partners and expand new business partner and customer. - Follow up agencies and record feedback and all the important information of the company’s service and product.-Complete agencies call reports, and sales reports in a timely and accurate manner- Follow up payment and get payment with all agencies or another business corporate partner as needs. - Assist senior digital marketing officer or branch manager to create sales strategy and action plan and to fulfill activities to achieve the target. - Present and introduce new project/product/new bus schedule or pricing to new clients and business corporate partner with professionalism. - Ensure that sale target as set per month is achieved.- Schedule bus or Rental bus’s payment invoice deliver to client and agencies as needs. - Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly sale report to supervisor or manager.  - Research and prepare list of agencies and keep in database.  - Event coordination and preparation. - Other duties will be assigned by management.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities

- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
About Job:

As a Digital Quality Assurance, you will test and lead a team on the functionality of the product to find the bugs in the system and issues related to the user interface or experience. You will work closely with IT-PMO developers, and designers, understand features and implement robust and comprehensive test plans to verify the functionality of all digital banking new products. Success in this role will be demonstrated by providing quality work output, screening for errors, and refining usability throughout the software development and implementation process.


What you will do:
•	Leading UAT Team and Performing Digital User Acceptance Test (UAT) 
•	Update Management on the test result and the issue highlighted 
•	Join the project planning, estimate testing, and manage testing done during the timeline set  
•	Develop, review, and update test plans, Test cases, and facilitate test tools. 
•	Controls and manage daily test activities. 
•	Document and evaluate test results 
•	Detects, logs, and reports bugs and glitches. 
•	Perform testing on the products, functional testing, regression testing, exploratory testing, etc.  
•	Take ownership of product quality and readiness for every product release.  
•	Clear and effective communication of issues to the developer  
•	Ensure the testing meet the business’s expectation and demand 
•	Test driving user, feature grooming, designing, and developing through test case 
•	Manage UAT sign-off with relevant stakeholders 
•	Handle tasks assigned by Line Manager
Job Requirement:
What you should have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software engineering, or related fields 
•	4 years experience with QA tester role for Mobile App or web project 
•	Understanding of testing process and methodologies. 
•	Experience or knowledge in creating test deliverables such as test cases and test status reports 
•	High attention to detail and solid analytical and problem-solving skills 
•	Outstanding written and verbal communication skills. 
•	Experience in agile frameworks and regression testing desired 
•	Good time management and self-discipline.

Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

job title: Senior Head Office Internal Audit Officer
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: Senior Head Office Internal Audit Officer
Job Description: - Preparation of individual audit planning – data collection, define key risk concerns, compile activities chart, etc. - Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit - Attending meeting with auditees to develop an understanding of business process- Performing risk assessments on key business activities and using this information to guide what should be covered in audits- Initiate internal controls document to ensure key risks in departments under responsibilities are identifying and testing- Assist in developing and updating Internal Audit Programs under responsibility to ensure relevant and up to date- Assist in reviewing and revising working paper to discuss with HO IAS- Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual IT audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the IT audit field works, meeting notes etc. - Preparation of the consolidated internal audit reports - Actively involved in controlling the departments under own responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost control management, business and controls risks – any particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be brought to the attention of the IAD/HO IAS- Ensure that all working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.- Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes- Other tasks assigned by the IAD/HO IAS.
Job Requirement: - University degree in banking/finance, accounting, business or economics, preferably a specialized accounting degree.- At least two years of experience in internal audit in the microfinance/banking/audit firm/other sectors- Good understanding of Internal Control- The ability to use your own initiative- Analytical thinking and attention to detail- The ability to work effectively on your own and as part of a team- Strong ethical standard and high levels of integrity- Resilience under pressure- Flexible thinking and ability to adapt to change - Strong advance excel skill. Company Profile:
For WON Majestic, it all started with a few Malaysian siblings who have the vision to take the Malaysian flagship to the global stage. Hence, WON Majestic was incorporated in 2017 with a solid backing of qualified management team from Malaysia, Singapore and China who have over 20 years of real estate management experience.

It is not easy to make its presence felt in the international map. The company has to face many cultural differences as well as different and unfamiliar local Government policies. But with true grit and perseverance, WON Majestic has weathered all storm. In fact, the company charted new milestones in 2018 by being one of the few foreign developers to obtain Housing Development Permit in Cambodia. Since then, success breeds success. In 2019, WON Majestic was granted Qualified Investment Project Status from Council for the Development of Cambodia (CDC).

As the world was hit by the COVID-19 pandemic, real estate developers need to adapt to the new normal and consumer trend. WON Majestic has taken initiatives to comply with the strict Government’s Standard Operating Procedure for a safe and clean development.
There will be many challenges ahead for the real estate market but WON Majestic is positive that its future is promising. After all, we have proven to have “WON” against the odds.

job title: Senior Associate, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
position: Senior Associate, Business Intelligence and Data Analytics
Job Description:
About The Job:
Support business performance management through the development and provision of business intelligence, analytics, and IT-enabled processes. 

What You Will Do:
•	Plan, coordinate and oversee business intelligence and analytics activities and platforms.
•	Ensure accuracy, timeliness, and accessibility of business reports and analytics (including sales history, trade performance, market insights, and demand forecasts, etc.)
•	Take initiatives in developing IT-enabled processes and platforms to monitor and improve business performance.
•	Ensure clear business requirements are understood and incorporated in IT solution projects.
•	Ensure cost effectiveness of analytics activities and IT-supported business processes.
•	Plan, review and control budget and spending of dealer incentives.
•	Set and monitor goals and targets for team.
•	Train and develop people in analytics and insights value chain.
•	Support CMCB BU’s in developing business intelligence and analytics activities and processes.
•	Perform other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Master’s degree in business, data science, or any related field. 
•	At least 3 years of experience in business performance management, data, and analytics, project management, or related areas.
•	Knowledge of descriptive and predictive analytics
•	Knowledge of business strategy and model
•	Knowledge of insights value chain
•	Some knowledge of AI, machine learning & IT solutions for business
•	Knowledge of budget management
•	Advanced statistical analysis techniques (in Excel, Power BI & others)
•	Strong analytical and logical thinking
•	Data Intelligence
•	Strong self-learning capability
•	Advanced English language ability
•	Strong communication (presentation and written report) 
•	Advanced proficiency in other MS Office (Word & PowerPoint)
•	Ability to think creatively and innovatively
•	Ability to work under pressure
•	Potential to grow and lead across teams

company_name: Howard Johnson Plaza by Wyndham Blue Bay Sihanoukville
Job Description:
Position Summary: To be responsible for the overall daily and ongoing operation of the Front Office department and it’s units: Reception, Concierge, and Guest Service Center

1. Be responsible for all Front Office areas: Duty Manager, Reception, Concierge, Guest Service Center
2. Control the availability of rooms, room types, accuracy of room count and rate categories together with Revenue Manager
3. Review arrival information on a daily basis, VIPs, regular guests, long staying guest, groups, special requests etc. Follow up with relevant department
4. Approve upgrades and special amenities
5. Maximize occupancy, revenue and average rate while maintaining high service standards 
6. Adhere to complimentary rooms procedures
7. Liaise with the Housekeeping Department to ensure room image and the “Room Ready on Arrival” policy are maintained
8. Ensure Front Office personnel handle guest registration efficiently, promptly and courteously 
9. Be aware of all establishment credit policies and procedures 
10. Liaise closely with Finance Department to ensure that credit procedures are properly carried out
11. Ensure correct foreign currency exchange procedure 
12. Ensure correct handling of safe deposit boxes
13. Know system operation, failure and recovery procedures  
14. Conduct guest room inspections together with the Housekeeping Manager  
15. Responsible for the compilation of statistics for Front Office and the provision of reports relation to that area 
16. Ensure departmental reports are prepared accurately and distributed on schedule 
17. Responsible for handling of reservations when reservation office is closed
18. Set up Systems to monitor achievement of departmental goals and objectives
19. Manage department strategic planning and development
20. Manage the development of department operating plans and reports in order to improve strengths, overcome weaknesses and capture opportunities 
21. Set up systems to capture guest feedback and present to Management on a regular basis
22. Institute suitable processes to allow for introduction of managed change within the department
23. Design internal reporting systems required by the department
24. Manage the development of new products and services
25. Promote products and services
26. Manager quality improvement
27. Handle and store stock according to stock control procedures
28. Coordinate work operations within the department
29. Develop performance standards for operations in the department
30. Assess work operations and prepare plans to implement change when required
31. Prevent and resolve grievances
32. Recruit associates together with Human Resources Department
33. Discipline staff when applicable
34. Provide ongoing advice and support to staff under your supervision
35. Implement appropriate management practices that provide staff motivation and communication
36. Ensure on-going departmental training
37. Manage the delivery of high quality service to guests
38. Manage the development and implementation of guest service strategies
39. Ensure guest needs and reasonable requests are met
40. Seek opportunities to continually improve guest service
41. Identify VIP, regular and long staying guest, develop rapport to offer personalized service and assistance
42. Promote the hotel product and service
Job Requirement:
- Education Background: At least 3 year college education
- Experience: 3 year’s assistant front office manager experience
- Personable, neat and tactful
- Female – 162cm, 

Skills:
Verbal facility
Be fluent in English & Chinese language
Able to relate with different types of personalities

job title: Senior Officer, Branch Support & Operations Governance
position: Senior Officer, Branch Support & Operations Governance
Job Description:
Summary of Position:

Support Branches and carry out assurance reviews at Branches, Operations, and Call Centers in ensuring their compliance with the requirements of the policies, procedures, and regulatory guidelines and assist in the readiness of new Branches set up.

What You Will Do:
•	To conduct full scope and thematic assurance reviews of Branches, Operations, and Call Centers to ensure they are compiled to policies, procedures, and guidelines.
•	Assist in the development of an Assurance Review Program covering laws, regulations, and internal policies and procedures to be used in reviewing Branches and Operations.
•	Assist in reviewing the effectiveness of internal controls and operating risks at Branches and Operations as part of the first line of defense, working in close coordination Audit, Compliance, and Risk Department.
•	Support the Lead in carrying out briefing sessions for Branche's staff on strengthening internal controls.
•	Administer and monitor of Policies and Procedures of the Bank.
•	Ensure Policies and Procedures are promptly uploaded in CMCB Portal for CMCB staff to access/view.
•	Provide continuous support to Branches in the areas of system and operations to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.
•	Assist Branches in a quick solution to all issues raised.
•	Support the Lead in training Branches and new staff on the requirements of policies, procedures, and guidelines/workflows.
•	assist the Lead in ensuring the readiness of staff for new Branch openings.
•	Assist the Lead to monitor and review internal control and risk at Branches.
•	Any responsibilities assigned by the Lead.
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Bachelor’s degree in finance, accounting, or other relevant fields.
•	Minimum 2 years’ experience in branch support.
•	Ability to support branch both system and operations issues.
•	Computer skills in Ms. Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.
•	Good command of spoken and written English is required.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
Summary of Position:

To manage the Contact Centre operations to ensure that inbound and outbound calls/queries from and to customers are promptly and efficiently attended to. All customer enquiries are addressed and complaints escalation and resolution are promptly managed.   

What You Will Do:
•	Responsible for the overall supervision and administration of Call Centre Operations
•	Monitor and evaluate the performance of all the call centre agents
•	Monitoring and usage of social media channels – Facebook, Whatsapp, Telegram
•	Train and support call centre agents in the efficient and effective performance of their roles
•	Continuously evaluate call centre technologies and customer service standards and propose improvements to management
•	Ensure proper and prompt handling, escalation and resolution of customers' complaints
•	Ensure that Dispute Resolutions Handling is in accordance with relevant procedures and guidelines
•	Prepare call centre performance reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing data and trends for the Head of Operations / Management/ President
•	Review and revise the Call Center operating procedure and related policy & procedure
•	Participate actively in the system and process-related projects and initiatives to enhance and improve Call Centre Operations.
•	Ensure strict compliance with requirements of the Bank’s Policies and Procedures and regulatory guidelines in executing the day-to-day operations
•	Ensure effective and efficient functioning of the unit through continuous supervision and monitoring of the staff performance.
•	Establish KPI for staff and ensure regular assessment of their performance
•	Ensure good staff morale is maintained and they remain motivated
•	Other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Graduated in business administration, Banking, finance, or another related field
•	Has worked at all levels at Call Centres with preferably reputable financial institutions
•	At least 5 years of experience with the ability to manage call centre operations
•	Involvement in system and process improvement-related projects
•	Ability to provide training in related areas
•	Experience in leadership roles
•	Knowledge of the end-to-end functioning of Call Centre Operations
•	Knowledge of regulatory requirements in Complaints handling and resolution
•	Proficiency in English and Khmer
•	Knowledge and understanding of Banking Products & Services
•	Knowledge of System and mobile application
•	Proficiency in computer and office applications such as Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook
•	Strong interpersonal skills, ability to connect with customers, direct reports and Senior Management.
•	Able to multitask, cope with high-volume operations and challenging targets, deal with pressure
•	Strong analytical skills and problem-solving abilities
•	A hands-on attitude to get involved in front-line work in order to get the job done and better understand the business
•	Ability to learn and adapt to new changes fast
•	Ability to make a fair judgement and provide a reasonable solution for problem-solving
•	Ability to communicate and work well in a diverse team
•	Ability to develop team skills by mentoring and coaching

job title: ប្រធានគណនេយ្យ
company_name: LY HONG CHHOY TRADING CO., LTD
position: ប្រធានគណនេយ្យ
Job Description:
 ប្រធានផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ត្រូវទទួលខុសត្រូវផ្ទាល់ចំពោះអគ្គនាយក និងអគ្គនាយិកា​ក្រុមហ៊ុន
ក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងរាល់សកម្មភាពរបស់ផ្នែក និងស្ថិតក្រោមការចង្អុលបង្ហាញរផ្ទាល់របស់អគ្គនាយក
និង​អគ្គនាយិកា​ដោយអនុវត្ត​នូវបណ្តាការងារជាក់ស្តែងមួយចំនួនដូចខាងក្រោម ៖
- ធ្វើការបែងចែកការងាររបស់ផ្នែក និងប្រគល់ភារកិច្ចដល់និយោជិតក្រោមឱវាទដោយធ្វើការ 
ពន្យល់ ណែនាំ បុគ្គលិក ទាំងអស់អំពីរបៀបរបបធ្វើការ និងភារៈទទួលខុសត្រូវ តាមមុខការ នីមួយៗ ។
- តាមដានត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនូវរាល់ការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិក ក្រោមឱវាទ
និងដោះស្រាយរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមានក្នុងផ្នែក ។

job title: Senior Officer, Digital and Payments Operations
position: Senior Officer, Digital and Payments Operations
Job Description:
Summary of Position:

The Senior officer will handle testing, reviewing, and resolving issues of new features on the Mobile App. Reconcile and properly file documents and reporting.

What You Will Do:
•	Ensure the smooth and efficient operations of all
•	Reconcile payments to ensure the accounting system reflects the correct transactions of Digital product/service
•	Handle and responsible for daily accounting activity, bookkeeping and GL raising, balancing and reconciliation, and processing posting journal entries into the system of issuing and acquiring transaction
•	Assist auditors – internal and external – with the documentation required for the auditors to do their job satisfactorily
•	Maintain required files, reports, and data
•	Involve/support new project/payment feature with stakeholders
•	Create/revise policy and procedure
•	Prepare the NBC report
•	Other duties as assigned
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Graduated in business administration, Banking, and finance, or another related field
•	Card and CSS product/service knowledge
•	Accounting entry knowledge
•	Previous experience of reconcile, Banking, and digital platform
•	NBC Bakong Knowledge
•	Suspended account and GL account understanding
•	Communication skills
•	Stress tolerance
•	Knowledge of computers, the internet of things, and Microsoft Office
•	Good command of spoken and written English is required.
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description: The Engineering Administrator role requires a dynamic, highly motivated individual who embraces Song Saa’s vision of luxury that treads lightly.*** Responsible for:• Maintains & keep records of all necessary Engineering day to day operation.• Coordinate with other employees and departments to respond to requests and resolve maintenance issues • Requisitioning of materials required to maintain stock level• Coordinate and monitor of daily attendance of engineering department • Responsible to receive, store and issue supplies and equipment• Compile records of supply transactions and verify that supplies received are listed on requisitions and invoices.• Conduct inventory of individual tools.
Job Requirement: • At least two years’ experience in administrative work in the hospitality industry.• Experience living and working in remote locations is essential. • Computer literacy, including knowledge and experience with Word and Excel proficiency. • Enthusiastic with a passion for customer service.• Excellent English speaking and writing ability.Interested applicants should apply and submit their CV to talent@songsaa.comLearn more about Song Saa at www.songsaa.com
Company Profile:
Created with sustainability in mind, Song Saa Private Island reflects the beauty of the Cambodian coastline. It’s a place that breathes in time with nature, built from local materials, by local hands, and infused with local art and soul. An evolved tropical getaway with a pristine private beach, spacious wooden villas, heavenly spa sanctuaries and a preserved coral reef, Song Saa Private Island lets you detach from the world and tune into simple luxuries.

Built with reclaimed timber and materials from the mainland, the resort’s design and architecture reiterates our commitment to sustainability. Each villa is a private sanctuary, a refined blend of thatched roofs, linen-draped canopy beds, up-cycled décor and repurposed furniture. Discarded oil drums find new life as lamps. Driftwood serves as a table or bench. Salvaged wood from old fishing boats and factory yards now forms decks and floors and beams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078330733 Koh Ouen, Khan Mittapheap  078330733

Job Description:
About the Job:

Execute/perform treasury duties including assets and liabilities management, liquidity management, foreign exchange sale, and financial institutions relationships.

What You Will Do:
•	Efficiently manage assets and liabilities management to ensure that the bank’s fund is utilized at its optimal level
•	Regularly manage and monitor prudential ratios to make sure they always comply with regulatory limits
•	Perform foreign exchange sales including but not limited to FX spot, forward, and swap
•	From time-to-time train front-line staff and relevant stakeholders on foreign exchange knowledge
•	Maintain good relationships with interbank and handled financial institutions related tasks such as performing KYC and counterparty periodic review
•	Managing market risks such as exchange rate risk and interest rate risk, and counterparty risk and developing tools and strategies to mitigate those risks
•	Engage in fundraising activities to support the business strategy at competitive pricing
•	Other tasks as assigned by the line manager
Job Requirement:
What You Should Have:
•	Degree in Finance and Banking and/or any other related fields
•	Minimum of 2-year working experience in a Treasury, FI, and/or sales function
•	Understanding and experience in treasury management including FX sale, liquidity management, cash flow forecasting, and various financial instruments
•	Great understanding of financial markets, financial instruments, and debt instruments
•	Excellent banking relationship management and covenants
•	Strong time management and task management skills
•	Ability to work under pressure and a tight timeline
•	Good negotiation and communication skills
•	Appropriate handling of sensitive information
•	English language and Microsoft Office proficiency
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Marketing Manager to help manage our marketing plan & strategy.
Probation period will be for 3 months.
Salary will be 600$-700$ per month based on experience.

● Organize and conduct promotional events and roadshows
● Monitor social media account management (new posts, interact with potential customers, etc.,) 
● Monitor community management on App (post updates, reply to customer questions, etc.)
● Manage and coordinate all work activities related to advertising marketing
● Analyze customer market needs and analyze competitors
● Develop a marketing plan to suit the current market situation
● Manage productivity, marketing plans and projects.
● Monitor and disseminate all activities and marketing results
● Manage marketing expenses according to the set budget
● Develop strategies to increase the effectiveness of sales promotion
● Establish business with new customers and maintain relationships with existing customers
● Maintains potential leads and follow up by making subsequent sales pitch
● Timely sharing of qualified leads to reporting officer, and preparation of periodic report 
● Accurately entering and maintaining data on leads and customers into the CRM database
Job Requirement:
● University graduate
● Minimum 3-year work experience in marketing field 
● Able to travel domestically alone as needed
● Commercially oriented mindset with ability to engage with people on a daily basis
● Experience working with Digital marketing, social media and events 
● Interested to work in startup environment with results-driven attitude
● Flexible and results-oriented mindset
● English writing and speaking skill will be an advantage

Recruitment process

Interested applicants should send their CV to hr.cambodia@agrosglobal.com
