company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
• Reviewing IT audit planning, define key risk concerns, and conduct IT internal audit mission with IT IAO
• Taking lead of the individual internal audit team in each audit as well as full support to the IT IAO
• Supervision and monitoring of IT audit works performed by the team members and consolidate IT internal audit report
• Maximizing effectiveness of the IT audit results through participation in the management meeting – debriefing
• Actively involved in controlling the IT department under own responsibilities with respect to risks management, cost control management, business and controls risks – any particular worrying issues pertaining to these should be brought to the attention of the IAD/IT IAM, then meeting with MJQ’s senior management for solutions
• Provide training to the team members when deem necessary, provide effective coaching to ensure effective knowledge exchange and internal audit quality in its process and output
• Ensure that all audit activities are monitored and its status be tracked against individual IT audit plan – audit commencement date, completion date of the IT audit field works, meeting notes etc.
• Ensure that all IT working practices at all stages are in line with the approved Internal Audit Policies in term of quality control procedures, sampling procedures, audit testing procedures etc.
• Assist to design IT IA policy, procedure and guideline for IT IA team to implement effectively
• Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes
• Ensure suggestions for more efficient and effective identification/IT audit procedures of material gaps under area of responsibilities
• Identify the weaknesses and risks in IT infra-structure, servers and database.
• Provide security best practice to IT Infra-structure, servers and database to prevent security breaches.
• Initiate internal controls document to ensure key risk in IT department are identifying and testing.
• Other tasks assigned by the IAD/IT IAM
Job Requirement:
• A minimum university degree in IT. IIA understanding or Master of IT degree is an advantage.
• About 1 years of experience in the leadership role or 3 years of experience of IT audit
• At least 3 years of IT audit experience (Information system governance, Infra-structure security, severs security hardening, database security hardening)
• Certified Ethical Hacker is preferred.
• Knowledge of Information Technologies Standard Framework.
• Good analysis and troubleshooting system in Firewall
• Knowledge of database and software for query report such as SQL, VBA,… is an advantage
• Knowledge of IT and system project is preferable
• Ability to write timely, clear and concise reports on the findings
• Good written and spoken English, as well as communication and interpersonal skills
• High motivation and ability to work without supervision.

**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖
•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ
•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍
•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ
• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ
•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន
•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ
•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក
•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ
•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងារ

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description: - Contacting with customers, ground survey, designing demand of customers (housing mainly)- Carrying out the design of ground floor drawings, 3D rendering, Interior and exterior rendering, details construction design drawings- Coordinate with other departments in the implementation process of structural design, electricity and water- Managing the teams to implement the contracts signed with customers, Supervising and controlling the construction quality of the team.- Other tasks assigned by board of director
Job Requirement: - Bachelor Degree of architecture construction…- Have Design certificate is an advantage- Proficient in the use of work-related software: Revit, 3D Max, Sketchup, AutoCAD- Experience at least 1 years related to requirement above
Company Profile: 1. Introduce :G.I Services Company (Cambodia) is a member company of Viettel Construction Corporation in Vietnam, was first established in 2015, has its head office in Phnom Penh and 22 branches spread across provinces in Cambodia.Maintaining its position as one of the leading companies in Cambodia providing telecommunications operations and maintenance services, G.I Services (Cambodia) wishes to continue to promote its scale in 2022, not not only stop at the traditional telecommunications industry, but also expand and introduce to the market new services in civil construction and trading in solar energy products/services.With the desire to build a young, dynamic team of employees, and to create professional values and respond to the continuous development of the company in the next stages. G.I Services Company (Cambodia) is looking forward to receiving feedback from candidates who are looking for a professional working environment toimprove their qualifications and gain precious experience.2. Company information:- Number of employees: Almost 1000 employees in 22 Provincial Branches of Cambodia.- Business lines: + Providing technical services in term of telecommunication operation and maintenance; + Providing solar equipments/products and installation/repairing services.+ Providing Civil construction services.3. company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Monitor and implement the Annual Audit Plan of assigned teams• Review the audit plan of assigned team and update to Internal Audit Director (IAD) and contribute to preparation of annual audit plan where necessary• Monitoring of audit execution/ spot follow up over the IA activities and performance• Review of consolidated reporting output by the IT Senior/IT Internal Audit Officer• Discussion on audit reports, critical audit matters identified, meeting with related management team for specific issues addressed• Active in understanding the report processes produced by IT team and test the reports to ensure correctness and keep updating to team and Internal Audit Director• Reviews IT, operational and business risks, functions and activities, and evaluates in order to determine audit scope, and recommend to propose audit• Designs IT audit programs, penetration test and procedures to execute the annual audit plan, assess controls and to meet audit objectives to ensure relevant and up to date.• Performs testing and walkthrough IT procedures to determine company compliance on assigned IT Standard• Reviews and analyzes the control structure, performs walkthrough and testing IT procedures and communicates results to the process owners and the IT team• Provide training to staff and ensure that IT audit staff is staying up-to-date of the developments of the institution and help staff to achieve their career plan• Ensure constant improvement of IT IA performance and quality as well as efficiency• Actively involved in discussion of audit findings and its status, provide feedback on effectiveness of post- audit corrections process and give recommendation for changes• Encourage and promote a collaborative and transparent working culture• Other tasks assigned by IAD.
Job Requirement: • About 2 years of experience in the leadership role or 4 years of experience of IT work• At least 3 years IT audit experience in IT Audit system, network and IT security is an advantage • Certified Ethical Hacker is preferred.• Good analysis and troubleshooting system and configuration of CISCO and Firewall • Knowledge of database and software for query report such as SQL, VBA,… is an advantage• Knowledge of IT and system project is preferable• Good understanding of Internal Control and processes• Good strategic thinking and benchmark best practice of Internal Audit and Business• Staff supervision, training/coaching and management experience • Good written and spoken English, communication and interpersonal skills• High motivation and ability to work without supervision.

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • រៀបចំកិបកាសែតរៀងរាល់ព្រឹក នៅជាន់ផ្ទាល់ដី និងការរក្សាទុកទិន្នន័យ• បោសសម្អាត រៀបចំទុកដាក់សៀវភៅ តុ កៅអី ក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យឱ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ របៀបរៀបរយ និងអនាម័យតាមដាន ដោះស្រាយ ត្រួតពិនិត្យការខ្ចីសៀវភៅយឺត ឬបាត់ និងការផាកពិន័យ• បោះត្រាក្នុងសៀវភៅ• បញ្ចូលកាតាឡុកសៀវភៅ• អ៊ុតក្របសៀវភៅ• គ្រប់គ្រងការខ្ចី និងសងសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បញ្ចូលពាក្យសុំចូលជាសមាជិបណ្ណាល័យ បោះត្រា និងចុះហត្ថលេខា• ត្រួតពិនិត្យមើលសិស្សពេលសិស្សចូលបណ្ណាល័យ និងការសម្របសម្រួលផ្សេងៗ• ថតរូបភាពសកម្មភាពសិស្សអានសៀវភៅក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ស្រង់ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីរបាយការណ៍ខ្ចី-សងសៀវភៅ និងប្រាក់ផាកពិន័យ ទៅកាន់ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំវគ្គសិក្សា កត់ត្រាកំណត់ហេតុអង្គប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ និងប្រចាំឆ្នាំ• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ស្ថិតិអ្នកចូលប្រើប្រាស់បណ្ណាល័យ និងកុំព្យូទ័រ ប្រចាំខែ• បំពាក់សម្ភារផ្សេងៗ ឱ្យឯកសារ (បិទលេខកូដ សលាកប័ត្រខ្ចីសង Barcode ពាក្យកម្មសិទ្ធ និងស្លាកផ្សេងៗ)• ស្នើសុំសម្ភារដែលត្រូវប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ• រាប់ស្តុកសៀវភៅ• ចូលរួមកិច្ចប្រជុំគណៈកម្មការអគារប្រចាំខែ• ចងក្រងប្រវត្តិសកម្មភាពដែលមានក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ប្រគល់កាសែតទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបណ្ណសារដ្ឋាន (ចំពោះតាមសាខាប្រគល់ទៅផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល)• ស្រង់ឈ្មោះ និងធ្វើបញ្ជីបញ្ជីឈ្មោះសមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• ចែកបណ្ណសរសើរដល់សមាជិកដែលបានចំណាយពេលច្រើនក្នុងបណ្ណាល័យ• បង្កើតសកម្មភាពជម្រុញអំណាន និងផ្សព្វផ្សាយអំពីបណ្ណាល័យ (យ៉ាងតិច៤សកម្មភាពក្នុង១ឆ្នាំ)• រៀបចំតុបតែងសោភ័ណភាពបណ្ណាល័យទៅតាមព្រឹត្តិការណ៍សកម្មភាពបណ្ណាល័យ និងបុណ្យប្រពៃណីជាតិ និងអន្តរជាតិ• ធ្វើបញ្ជីចំណងជើងសៀវភៅដែលត្រូវស្នើសុំទិញបន្ថែម• ចុះបញ្ជីសារពើភ័ណ្ឌសម្ភារ និងចុះបញ្ជីសៀវភៅចូល• ជួយការងារផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមការស្នើសុំជាក់ស្តែង• ទទួលការចុះអធិការកិច្ចរបស់ក្រសួង-មន្ទីរអប់រំ សម្រាប់ថ្នាក់បឋមសិក្សា មធ្យមសិក្សាបឋមភូមិ និងទុតិយភូមិ (សម្រាប់តែបណ្ណាល័យ សាលារៀន អន្តរទ្វីប អាមេរិកាំង)
Job Requirement: • ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬវិញ្ញាបនបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ• ទទួលបានវិញ្ញាបនបត្របញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាមុខវិជ្ជាជំនាញបណ្ណារក្ស និងបញ្ចប់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស• ទទួលបានវគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលនានាដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធបច្ចេកទេសបណ្ណាល័យ• មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារចាប់ពី១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ**អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ការងារ (Benefits) ៖•  ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងជាមួយទីផ្សារ•  បណ្ណធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព ប.ស.ស. និងធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់បុគ្គល ២៤ម៉ោង នៅទូទាំងពិភពលោក•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកលំហែមាតុភាព បិតុភាព និងច្បាប់អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍•  ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងច្បាប់ឈឺ• ច្បាប់ឈប់សម្រាកបុណ្យជាតិដោយមានប្រាក់ឈ្នួល យោងតាមសេចក្តីប្រកាសរបស់ក្រសួងការងារ និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈ•  ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងាររបស់ខ្លួន•  វគ្គបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលល្អៗសម្រាប់ការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ•  អាហារូបករណ៍ដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសាររបស់បុគ្គលិក•  ការដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ដោយផ្អែកលើបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងតាមការវាយតម្លៃគុណភាពការងារ•  ប្រាក់បំណាច់អតីតភាពការងាររបៀបនៃការដាក់ពាក្យ៖សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថត 4x6 តាមរយៈ៖អ៊ីម៉ែល៖ hr@mjqeducation.edu.khតេឡេក្រាម (Telegram)៖ https://t.me/HRMJQEឬ ដាក់ពាក្យផ្ទាល់តាមរយៈអាសយដ្ឋាន៖ #223 & 227 ផ្លូវម៉ៅសេទុង សង្កាត់ទួលស្វាយព្រៃ១ ខណ្ឌបឹងកេងកង រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description: • Oversee daily operations.• Enforce all workplace policies and procedures.• Monitor patient’s condition and assess their needs to provide the best possible care and advice.• Observe and interpret patient’s symptoms and communicate them to physicians.• Recording patient’s vital signs and medication information and fill in patient’s charts.• Adjust and administer patient’s medication and provide treatments according to physician’s order.• Inspect the facilities and act to maintain excellent hygiene and safety (decontaminating equipment, sanitizing surfaces, preparing beds etc…).• Provide instant medical care in emergencies.• Check and maintain nursing supplies.
Job Requirement: • Diploma/Bachelor’s degree in nursing required.• 1-3 years nursing experiences.• Basic computer skills.• Experiences in home health care.• Experiences in emergency room or intensive care.• Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physician and staff.How to apply!Submit your CVs to our Talent Acquisition Team (TAT), Via email to: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh  Telegram: https://t.me/HRMJQETel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 93 335 564
